Shandong
山东

Pop 99.4 million
人口 9940 万

Why Go?
为什么要去？

Steeped in natural and supernatural allure, the Shandong (山东, Shāndōng) peninsula on China’s northeastern coast is the stuff of legends. Its captivating landscape – a fertile flood plain fed by rivers and underground springs, capped by granite peaks and framed in wild coastline – can’t help but inspire wonder.
位于中国东北海岸的山东半岛充满了自然和超自然的魅力，是传说中的东西。其迷人的景观——由河流和地下泉水注入的肥沃洪泛区，以花岗岩山峰为顶端，周围环绕在狂野的海岸线中——不禁激发人们的惊奇。

A lumpy-headed boy named Confucius was born here and grew up to develop a philosophy of virtue and ethics that would reach far beyond his lectures under an apricot tree. Three centuries later China’s first emperor, Qin Shi Huang, would climb Tai Shan, Shandong’s highest peak, to proclaim a unified empire in 219 BC.
一个名叫孔子的笨头男孩在这里出生，从小发展出一种美德和伦理哲学，这种哲学远远超出了他在杏树下的讲座。三个世纪后，中国的第一位皇帝秦始皇于公元前 219 年登上山东最高峰泰山，宣布建立统一帝国。

But Shandong is more than the sum of its historical parts. The energetic buzz in seaside Qingdao ranks the city among the best places to live in China. This is Shandong’s real draw: you can climb mountains, feast on fine seafood, quaff beer and still find time to hit the beach.
但山东不仅仅是其历史部分的总和。青岛海滨充满活力的喧嚣使这座城市跻身中国最佳居住地之列。这才是山东真正的吸引力：你可以爬山，享用精美的海鲜，喝啤酒，还能抽出时间去海滩。

When to Go
何时去

Jun–Aug Cool sea breezes and the beer festival make summer the time to explore Qingdao.
6 月至 8 月凉爽的海风和啤酒节使夏季成为探索青岛的时光。

Sep & Oct Sacred Tai Shan is gloriously shrouded in mist for just part (not all) of the day.
9 月和 10 月神圣的泰山在一天中的部分时间（不是全部）被迷雾笼罩。

Dec & Jan Dress warmly and ascend Shandong’s frosted peaks in the dry winter.
12 月和 1 月穿得暖和，在干燥的冬天登上山东的霜峰。

Shandong Highlights
山东亮点

1 Tai Shan Climbing the slopes of this sacred Taoist mountain, where stones speak the wisdom of millennia and views range in all directions.
1 泰山 攀登这座道教神山的山坡，石头诉说着千年的智慧，四面八方的景色。

2 Qingdao Chilling by the sea with a pitcher (or plastic bag) of China’s most famous brew.
2 青岛 在海边用一罐（或塑料袋）盛装中国最著名的啤酒来冰凉。

3 Qufu Perusing the ancient home town of local boy and philosophical heavyweight Confucius.
3 曲阜细细品味当地男孩和哲学重量级人物孔子的古老故乡。

4 Zhujiayu Overnighting in this charming, rural Ming-dynasty village.
4 朱家峪 在这个迷人的明代乡村过夜。

5 Ji’nan Strolling among the swaying willows, quiet waterways and ancient residential alleyways of the city famously built on top of 72 artesian springs.
5 济南漫步在摇曳的柳树、静谧的水道和建在 72 个自流泉之上的城市古老住宅小巷中。

6 Lao Shan Forging uphill in search of Taoist secrets and magnificent views.
6 老山锻造上坡，寻找道教秘境和壮丽景色。

7 Yantai Feeling the ocean breeze on your cheeks as you explore the history of this prosperous port city.
7 烟台 感受海风拂过脸颊，探索这座繁荣港口城市的历史。

8 Penglai Pavilion Discovering the legends of immortals, pirates and mirages.
8 蓬莱阁 发现仙人、海盗和海市蜃楼的传说。

History
历史

Shandong’s tumultuous history is tied to the capricious temperament of the Yellow River, which crosses the peninsula before emptying into the Bo Sea. The ‘Mother River’ nurtured Chinese civilisation, but when unhinged left death, disease and rebellion in its wake. In 1898, after a long period of floods followed by economic depression and unrest, the river again devastated the Shandong plain.
山东动荡的历史与黄河反复无常的气质息息相关，黄河穿过半岛，然后流入博海。“母亲河”孕育了中华文明，但当精神错乱时，它会留下死亡、疾病和叛乱。1898年，在经历了长期的洪水之后，经济萧条和动荡，河流再次摧毁了山东平原。

Europeans had also arrived. After two German missionaries died in a peasant uprising in western Shandong in 1897, Germany seized Qingdao, Britain forced a lease of Weihai, and soon six other nations scrambled for concessions. These acts, coupled with widespread famine, emboldened a band of superstitious nationalists, and in the closing years of the 19th century the Boxers rose out of Shandong, armed with magical spells and broadswords to lead a rebellion against the eight-nation alliance of Austria-Hungary, France, Germany, Italy, Japan, Russia, the UK and the USA. After foreign powers violently seized Beijing in 1900, the Empress Cixi effectively surrendered and Boxer and other resistance leaders were executed. The Qing dynasty would soon collapse.
欧洲人也来了。1897年，两名德国传教士在山东西部的农民起义中丧生后，德国夺取了青岛，英国强行租借了威海，很快其他六个国家也争先恐后地争夺租界。这些行为，加上广泛的饥荒，让一群迷信的民族主义者胆大妄为，在 19 世纪末，义和团从山东崛起，手持魔法咒语和大剑，领导了一场反抗奥匈帝国、法国、德国、意大利、日本、俄罗斯、英国和美国八国联盟的叛乱。1900年外国势力暴力夺取北京后，慈禧皇后实际上投降了，义和团和其他抵抗运动领导人被处决。清朝很快就会崩溃。

It was not until Japan’s surrender in WWII that Shandong emerged from decades of war and recovered its cities. In 1955 engineers began an ambitious 50-year flood-control program, and 1959 marked Shandong’s last catastrophic flood, though now China’s economic boom threatens to suck the Yellow River dry.
直到日本在二战中投降，山东才从数十年的战争中崛起，收复了城市。1955年，工程师们开始了一项雄心勃勃的50年防洪计划，1959年是山东最后一次灾难性洪水，尽管现在中国的经济繁荣有可能将黄河吸干。

Today Ji’nan, the provincial capital, and the prospering coastal cities of Yantai and Weihai, all play a supporting role to Qingdao, the province’s headliner.
如今，省会济南，以及繁华的沿海城市烟台、威海，都对青岛这个全省的头条新闻起到了配角作用。

Language
语言

Standard Mandarin is the primary language spoken in Shandong, but regional varieties of northern Mandarin often pop up in casual conversation. The characteristic drawls of the three most common dialects, Jìlǔ (冀鲁), Zhōngyuán (中原) and Jiāoliáo (胶辽), are each distinctive.
标准普通话是山东省的主要语言，但北方普通话的地区变体经常出现在随意的谈话中。冀鲁语、 中原语和胶辽语这三种最常见的方言的特色拉扯音各有特色。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

With South Korea and Japan just across the water, there are direct international flights through three airports – Ji’nan, Qingdao and Yantai. Ferries also sail from Qingdao and Yantai to South Korea.
韩国和日本隔海相望，有直飞国际航班，途经济南、青岛和烟台三个机场。渡轮也从青岛和烟台航行到韩国。

Shandong is linked to neighbouring and distant provinces by both bus (increasingly less popular) and rail (faster, cheaper and more frequent). Ji’nan is the transport hub, with rail connections to all major towns and cities in Shandong. China’s fabulous high-speed rail network now links all major cities in Shandong with the rest of the country.
山东通过公共汽车（越来越不受欢迎）和铁路（更快、更便宜、更频繁）与邻近和遥远的省份相连。济南是交通枢纽，有铁路连接山东所有主要城镇。中国神话般的高铁网络现在将山东省的所有主要城市与全国其他地区连接起来。

With rail connecting all the big towns, cities and drawcard sights, getting around Shandong by train is straightforward, with buses playing second fiddle, but the roads are useful for opening up the smaller corners of the province.
山东有铁路连接所有大城镇和景点，乘坐火车游览山东很简单，公共汽车是次要的，但道路对于开辟该省的小角落很有用。

Ji’nan 济南
Ji’nan 济南

%0531 / Pop 4.7 million
% 0531 / 人口 470 万

Ji’nan (Jǐ’nán) is more than just another provincial capital. On its surface the city is, like many others in China, a fast-developing metropolis, but beneath the urban sprawl are 72 artesian springs, which gently roil in azure pools and flow steadily into beautiful Daming Lake.
济南 （Jǐ'nán） 不仅仅是另一个省会城市。从表面上看，这座城市与中国的许多其他城市一样，是一个快速发展的大都市，但在城市扩张之下，有 72 个自流泉，在蔚蓝的水池中轻轻翻腾，稳定地流入美丽的大明湖。

1Sights
1 景点

Strolling among the swaying willows and quiet waterways of Ji’nan’s particularly lovely parks is a pleasant escape from the urban din.
漫步在济南特别美丽的公园摇曳的柳树和安静的水道中，是远离城市喧嚣的愉快方式。

Also don’t miss wandering around Spring Alley (泉巷, Quán Xiàng), a fascinating maze of historic residential alleyways with old spring-water wells on some street corners still used by residents today.
也不要错过在泉巷（泉巷 ，Quán Xiàng）闲逛，这是一个迷人的迷宫，由历史悠久的住宅小巷组成，一些街角有古老的泉水井，至今仍被居民使用。

Baotu SpringPARK
趵涂泉 PARK

(map Google map; 趵突泉, Bàotū Quán; 1 Baotuquan Nanlu, 趵突泉南路1号; ¥40; h7am-7pm Apr-Oct, to 6pm Nov-Mar; gK51)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 趵突泉 ，Bàotū Quán; 1 Baotuquan Nanlu， 趵突泉南路 1 号 ; ¥40; h 4 月至 10 月上午 7 点至晚上 7 点，11 月至 3 月下午 6 点; g K51）

This park’s namesake ‘spurting spring’ once shot metres into the air, inspiring ancient poets and painters alike. Today, as more water has been channelled from the city’s underground limestone aquifers, it arrives with more of a gurgle. Ji’nan’s local brew proudly bears its name.
这个公园的同名“喷泉”曾经冲向数米高的空中，激发了古代诗人和画家的灵感。如今，随着更多的水从城市的地下石灰岩含水层中排出，它带着更多的咯咯声到达。济南的当地啤酒自豪地以它的名字命名。

Daming LakeLAKE
大明湖 LAKE

(map Google map; 大明湖, Dàmíng Hú; h5am-10pm) F
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 大明湖 ，Dàmíng Hú; h 早上 5 点至晚上 10 点） F

All the water from Ji’nan’s springs eventually flows into Daming Lake, set within the largest park in the city, with boat rides, paddle boats, temples, bridges and little islands to explore. In summer lotuses bloom in pink and white. The park has been a scenic site since the Tang dynasty, inspiring everyone from Marco Polo to Deng Xiaoping to wax lyrical about its beauty.
济南泉水最终流入大明湖，大明湖位于该市最大的公园内，有乘船游览、明轮船、寺庙、桥梁和小岛可供探索。夏天，莲花绽放成粉红色和白色。自唐代以来，该公园一直是风景名胜，从马可·波罗到邓小平，每个人都对它的美丽赞不绝口。

Five Dragon Pool ParkPARK
五龙池公园 PARK

(map Google map; 五龙潭公园, Wǔlóngtán Gōngyuán; 18 Kuangshi Jie, 筐市街18号; ¥5; h7am-7pm Apr-Oct, to 6pm Nov-Mar; g5, 101)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 五龙潭公园 ， Wǔlóngtán Gōngyuán; 18 Kuangshi Jie， 筐市街 18 号 ; ¥5; h 4 月至 10 月上午 7 点至晚上 7 点，11 月至 3 月下午 6 点; g 5， 101）

These waters swirl up from the deepest depths of all the springs in the city to fill blue-green pools teeming with lucky carp. The park is a serene study of local life, where elders paint calligraphy on the steps and kids chase the goldfish.
这些水从城市所有泉水的最深处盘旋而上，充满了充满幸运鲤鱼的蓝绿色水池。公园是当地生活的宁静研究，长辈们在台阶上画书法，孩子们追逐金鱼。

Huancheng ParkPARK
环城公园 PARK

(map Google map; 环城公园, Huánchéng Gōngyuán; 2 Nanmen Jie; h24hr) F
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 环城公园 ，Huánchéng Gōngyuán;2 南门街; h 24 小时） F

This park on the Hucheng River is built around Black Tiger Spring (黑虎泉, Hēihǔ Quán), which empties into the old city moat through three stone tiger heads. It gets its name from the sound of the roaring water as it rushed over a tiger-shaped stone, that’s long gone but immortalised in Ming dynasty poetry. Locals still draw water from the springs here with buckets on ropes. The park is particularly popular in the early evening, when many of its features are lit up.
这个公园位于湖城河上，围绕黑虎泉（黑虎泉 ，Hēihǔ Quán）而建，黑虎泉通过三个石虎头流入老城护城河。它的名字来源于它冲过一块虎形石头时咆哮的水声，这块石头早已消失，但在明代诗歌中永垂不朽。当地人仍然用绳子上的水桶从这里的泉水中取水。该公园在傍晚特别受欢迎，此时它的许多景点都被点亮了。

Ji’nan MuseumMUSEUM
济南博物馆 MUSEUM

(map Google map; 济南市博物馆, Jǐ’nán Shì Bówùguǎn; %0531 8295 9204; www.jnmuseum.com; 30 Jing Shiyilu, 经十一路30号; audio tour ¥10; h9am-4.30pm Tue-Sun; gK51) F
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 济南市博物馆 ，Jǐ'nán Shì Bówùguǎn; % 0531 8295 9204;www.jnmuseum.com;30 Jing Shiyilu， 经十一路 30 号 ;语音导览 ¥10; h 周二至周日上午 9 点至下午 4.30; g K51） F

North of Thousand Buddha Mountain’s main entrance, the Ji’nan Museum has a small, distinctive collection that includes paintings, calligraphy, ceramics, Buddhist figures from the Tang dynasty and a delightful boat carved from a walnut shell.
济南博物馆位于千佛山正门以北，藏品数量不多，内容独特，包括唐代的绘画、书法、陶瓷、佛教人物和一艘用核桃壳雕刻而成的令人愉悦的船。

Great Southern MosqueMOSQUE
南方大清真寺清真寺

(map Google map; 清真南大寺, Qīngzhēn Nán Dà Sì; 47 Yongchang Jie; gK50, 101) F
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 清真南大寺 ， Qīngzhēn Nán Dà Sì;47 永昌街; g K50， 101） F

Ji’nan’s oldest mosque has stood in one form or another in the centre of town since 1295. Cover arms and remove hats before entering. A lively Hui (Muslim Chinese) neighbourhood is to the north.
济南最古老的清真寺自 1295 年以来一直以这样或那样的形式矗立在市中心。进入前遮住手臂并摘下帽子。北边是一个热闹的回族（中国穆斯林）社区。

Shandong MuseumMUSEUM
山东博物院 MUSEUM

(山东博物馆, Shāndōng Bówùguǎn; %0531 8505 8201; www.sdmuseum.com; 11899 Jingshi Lu, 经十路11899号; h9am-4pm Tue-Sun; g18, 119, 115, 202, K139) F
（ 山东博物馆 ，Shāndōng Bówùguǎn; % 0531 8505 8201;www.sdmuseum.com;11899 Jingshi Lu， 经十路 11899 号 h 周二至周日上午 9 时至下午 4 时; g 18、119、115、202、K139） F

The enormous provincial museum, 7km east of the city centre, surveys local culture from the mesolithic age to the present. Its collection began as one of the first organised museums in China in 1904. On display are oracle bones, Qi and Lu kingdom pottery, Han tomb murals and clothing worn by the Kong clan (Confucius’ descendants). Take any one of numerous buses along Jingshi Lu to Shěng Bówùguǎn (省博物馆) bus stop.
巨大的省立博物馆位于市中心以东 7 公里处，调查了从中石器时代到现在的当地文化。它的藏品始于 1904 年，是中国最早有组织的博物馆之一。展出的有甲骨文、齐鲁国陶器、汉墓壁画和孔氏（孔子的后裔）所穿的服装。乘坐沿着 Jingshi Lu 的众多巴士中的任何一辆到 Shěng Bówùguǎn （ 省博物馆 ） 巴士站。

Thousand Buddha MountainMOUNTAIN
千佛山 MOUNTAIN

(map Google map; 千佛山, Qiānfó Shān; 18 Jingshi Yilu; admission ¥30, one way/return cable car ¥20/30, luge ¥25/30; h5am-9pm; gK51)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 千佛山 ， Qiānfó Shān; 18 Jingshi Yilu;门票 ¥30，单程/往返缆车 ¥20/30，雪橇 ¥25/30; h 早上 5 点至晚上 9 点; g K51）

Beginning in the Sui dynasty (581–618), pious folk carved Buddhas into this mountain southeast of the city centre. The oldest are at Xinguochan Temple (兴国禅寺, Xīngguó Chánsì; entrance with Thousand Buddha Mountain ticket; h7.30am-4.30pm), the golden-roofed complex near the cable car and luge drop-off on the mountaintop. On the rare clear day looking south, you can spot Tai Shan, the anthill in the distance.
从隋朝（581-618）开始，虔诚的民间在市中心东南部的这座山上雕刻佛像。最古老的在兴国禅寺（兴国禅寺 ，Xīngguó Chánsì;凭千佛山门票进入; h 上午 7.30 至下午 4.30）， 靠近缆车和山顶雪橇下车的金色屋顶建筑群。在难得的晴朗天气向南看，您可以看到远处的蚁丘大山。

Sightseeing BoatsBOATING
观光船划船

(%0531 8690 5886; per stop ¥10; hevery 20min 9am-5pm)
（ % 0531 8690 5886;每站 10 日元; h 每 20 分钟 上午 9 点至下午 5 点）

These fun, open-air, motorised boats circle clockwise around the lovely Hucheng River and the south side of Daming Lake, making 10 stops at all the major sights including Baotu Spring, Black Tiger Spring, Five Dragon Pool and Quancheng Sq, as well as rising and falling several storeys via two fascinating locks. It takes about 1½ hours for the full circuit.
这些有趣的露天机动船顺时针绕着美丽的湖城河和大明湖南岸盘旋，在包括趵涂泉、黑虎泉、五龙潭和泉城广场在内的所有主要景点停留 10 个站点，并通过两个迷人的船闸升降数层楼。整个电路大约需要 11/2 小时。

4Sleeping
4 睡眠

Ji’nan has a fair mix of accommodation to suit all budgets, although, as is often the case in China, the cheapest lodgings often don’t accept foreigners.
济南有适合所有预算的住宿组合，尽管与中国经常发生的情况一样，最便宜的住宿通常不接受外国人。

Shān Yǔ HǎiGUESTHOUSE¥
山裕海宾馆 ¥

(map Google map; 山与海, Mountain & Sea Culture Hotel; %156 9231 2592, 0531 8118 7171; 1 Xiyundouyu Jie, off Shuanzhongci Jie, 双忠祠街西熨斗隅街1号; r from ¥160; aW)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 山与海 ，山海文化酒店; % 156 9231 2592， 0531 8118 7171;1 西云斗屿街，双忠祠街西熨斗隅街 1 号 ; r ¥160 起; a W ）

Hidden down a fascinating maze of historic residential alleyways – known collectively as Spring Alley (泉巷, Quán Xiàng) – this welcoming guesthouse with English-speaking staff is housed in a restyled old church building. The simple but spacious rooms have high ceilings and are off a central covered courtyard.
这家温馨的宾馆隐藏在迷人的历史悠久的住宅小巷迷宫中，统称为泉巷（泉巷 ，Quán Xiàng）——坐落在一栋经过改造的旧教堂建筑内，工作人员会说英语。简单而宽敞的客房拥有高高的天花板，位于带顶棚的中央庭院旁。

Walk north up Bianzhi Xiang (鞭指巷), then turn left at the end, down Shuanzhongci Jie (双忠祠街), and it’s on your left at the entrance to tiny Xiyundouyu Jie (西熨斗隅街). No English sign, but on hotel-booking websites it’s sometimes known as Mountain & Sea Culture Hotel.
沿着鞭指巷向北走，然后在尽头左转，沿着双忠祠街下，左边就是西熨斗隅街的入口处。没有英文标志，但在酒店预订网站上，它有时被称为山海文化酒店。

Located in a peaceful, tree-lined neighbourhood with plenty of cheap, locals restaurants nearby, this slightly run-down but very friendly hostel has tatty rooms off a small open-air central courtyard.
这家旅馆位于一个宁静的绿树成荫的街区，附近有许多便宜的当地餐馆，这家旅馆略显破旧，但非常友好，设有一个小露天中央庭院旁的破旧客房。

The tiny lobby at this lower-end midrange hotel won’t impress, but the rooms are well presented and comfortable, if a little small, and half of them overlook Quancheng Sq, which buzzes with locals come evening. No English spoken, but it’s a great location, within walking distance to most of the city’s sights.
这家低端中档酒店的小大堂不会给人留下深刻的印象，但房间布置得很好，很舒适，虽然有点小，而且其中一半可以俯瞰泉城广场，傍晚时分，这里挤满了当地人。不会说英语，但地理位置优越，步行即可到达城市的大部分景点。

This five-star hotel in the commercial district is an excellent option, with immaculate rooms, attentive staff and a 49th-floor revolving restaurant.
这家位于商业区的五星级酒店是一个绝佳的选择，拥有完美无暇的客房、细心的员工和位于 49 楼的旋转餐厅。

5Eating
5 吃

Ji’nan is a famed centre of Lǔ (Shandong) cuisine, characterised by bold flavours brought out by cooking over a high heat with plenty of oil and spices. Most of the best eating is found in the city’s streets and alleys.
济南是著名的鲁（山东）美食中心，其特点是用大量油和香料在高温下烹饪，味道浓郁。大多数最好的饮食都可以在城市的街道和小巷中找到。

Off Quancheng Lu’s shopping strip, Furong Jie map Google map (芙蓉街; snacks from ¥10; h9.30am-11pm) is a pedestrian alley crammed with restaurants and food stalls. Alternatively, for something more upmarket head to Ronghui Jinan Old Commercial Port map Google map (融汇济南老商埠, Rónghuì Jǐnán Lǎo Shāngbù; Jingsi Lu, 经四路; h9am-10pm).
泉城路购物区外， 芙蓉街地图 Google map（ 芙蓉街 ;小吃 10 元起; h 上午 9.30 至晚上 11 点） 是一条步行街，挤满了餐馆和小吃摊。或者，如果想更高档的东西，请前往融汇济南老商埠地图 Google map（ 融汇济南老商埠 ，Rónghuì Jǐnán Lǎo Shāngbù;Jingsi Lu， 经四路 h 9am-10pm）。

LǎopáifāngSHANDONG¥
山东 Lǎopáifāng¥

(map Google map; 老牌坊; %0531 8605 4567; 2 Daguan Yuan, 大观园2号; dishes ¥28-98; h11am-3pm & 4.30-9pm)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 老牌坊 % 0531 8605 4567; 2 大观园， 大观园 2 号 ; 菜品 ¥28-98; h 上午 11 点至下午 3 点和下午 4.30 点至晚上 9 点）

Just inside the low-key food street called Daguan Gardens map Google map (大观园, Dàguān Yuán; Jing Silu, 经四路; snacks from ¥10), this is a decent place for a refined take on Lǔ (Shandong) cuisine. Order the unpretentious classics like sweet and spicy cabbage with glass noodles (¥22) or lamb (braised or sautéed, from ¥19), accompanied with sesame cakes (¥2) – not rice. Chinese menu with pictures.
就在低调的美食街里，叫做大观园地图谷歌地图 （ 大观园 ，Dàguān Yuán;Jing Silu， 经四路 ;小吃从¥10 起）， 这里是品尝鲁（山东）美食的好地方。点朴实无华的经典菜肴，如甜辣卷心菜冬粉（22 日元）或羊肉（红烧或炒，19 日元起），配上芝麻饼（2 日元）——而不是米饭。带图片的中文菜单。

Yǐnhǔchí JiēSTREET FOOD¥
Yǐnhǔchí Jiē 街头小吃 ¥

(map Google map; 饮虎池街; Yǐnhǔchí Jiē, 饮虎池街; snacks from ¥10)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 饮虎池街 ;Yǐnhǔchí Jiē， 饮虎池街 ;小吃 10 日元起）

Evenings used to be smoky on Yinhuchi Jie in the Hui district near the Great Southern Mosque, with hawkers fanning the flames of charcoal grills lining the street, roasting up all manner of shāokǎo (barbecue skewers). Sadly coal-fired barbecues have been banned – too polluting apparently (though cars seem to be OK!) – but small restaurants do the same job on indoor electric barbecues.
晚上，大南方清真寺附近回族区的银湖池街上烟雾缭绕，小贩们在街道两旁的木炭烤架上煽风点火，烤着各种烧烤串。 可悲的是，燃煤烧烤已经被禁止——显然污染太大（尽管汽车似乎没问题！

Tables spill out onto the pavements, so you can still eat your skewers on the street, and the food is still delicious. Not much English is spoken round here, but you can’t go wrong if you just order some yángròu chuàn (羊肉串, lamb skewers) and a cold bottle of Tsingtao.
桌子铺满了人行道，所以你仍然可以在街上吃串，而且食物仍然很美味。这里的英语不多，但如果你只点一些羊肉串和一瓶冷的青岛，你就不会出错。

Parc66 restaurantsSHOPPING MALL¥¥
Parc66 餐厅购物中心 ¥¥

(map Google map; 恒隆广场, Hénglóng Guǎngchǎng; 6th fl, Parc66 Shopping Mall, 188 Quancheng Lu, 泉城路188号; h10am-10pm)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 恒隆广场 ，Hénglóng Guǎngchǎng;泉城路 188 号，Parc66 Shopping Mall，6 楼 188 h 10am-10pm）

If you’re struggling with Chinese-only menus, head to the 6th floor of this modern shopping mall, which is packed with restaurants (Cantonese, Japanese, Xinjiang, barbecue, noodles) and snack stalls, many of which have English menus. The other floors are also dotted with restaurants.
如果您正在为纯中文菜单而苦苦挣扎，请前往这个现代化购物中心的 6 楼，那里挤满了餐厅（粤菜、日本菜、新疆菜、烧烤、面条）和小吃摊，其中许多都有英文菜单。其他楼层也散布着餐厅。

6Drinking & Nightlife
6 饮酒与夜生活

There are one or two bars in the rebuilt enclave Ronghui Jinan Old Commercial Port (融汇济南老商埠, Rónghuì Jǐnán Lǎo Shāngbù).
重建后的飞地融汇济南老商埠（融汇济南老商埠 ，Rónghuì Jǐnán Lǎo Shāngbù）内有一两家酒吧。

Sonder CoffeeCAFE
桑德咖啡咖啡厅

(map Google map; 宿道咖啡, Sùdào Kāfēi; 23 Bianzhi Xiang, 鞭指巷23号; coffee from ¥25; h9am-8pm)

Perfect for a pick-me-up on your aimless wanders around the lovely lanes of Quán Xiàng (泉巷, Spring Alley), this super-cool, super-tiny coffee shop serves espresso-machine and pour-over brews using beans mostly from Yunnan province.
这家超酷、超小的咖啡店非常适合您在泉巷（泉巷 ，春巷）美丽的小巷里漫无目的地漫步，提供浓缩咖啡机和手冲咖啡，主要来自云南省的咖啡豆。

8Information
8 信息

ATMs are all over town.
自动取款机遍布全城。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

AIR
空气

Jinan Yaoqiang International Airport (济南遥墙国际机场, Jǐnán Yáoqiáng Guójì Jīchǎng; %0531 8208 6666; Jichang Lu, Yaoqiang, 济南市历城区遥墙镇机场路) is around 40km from the centre and has daily flights to all major Chinese cities, as well as flights to one or two international destinations such as Seoul, Bangkok and Singapore.
济南遥墙国际机场（济南遥墙国际机场 ，Jǐnán Yáoqiáng Guójì Jīchǎng; % 0531 8208 6666;济南市历城区遥墙镇机场路 ） 距离市中心约 40 公里，每天有航班飞往中国所有主要城市，以及飞往首尔、曼谷和新加坡等一两个国际目的地的航班。

BUS
总线

High-speed rail travel is slowly crippling China’s long-distance bus industry, but there are still some services from Ji’nan.
高铁旅行正在慢慢削弱中国的长途汽车行业，但仍有一些来自济南的服务。

The city’s most convenient station is the main long-distance bus station (长途总汽车站, Chángtú Zǒng Qìchē Zhàn; %0531 8594 1472; 131 Jiluo Lu; gK84), about 3km north of the train station, though buses to destinations within the province also leave from the Jinan Guangcheng Bus station (济南广城汽车站, Jǐnán Guǎngchéng Qìchēzhàn; %8830 3030; 22 Chezhan Jie, 车站街22号) directly across from the train station.
该市最方便的车站是主要的长途汽车站 （ 长途总汽车站 ，Chángtú Zǒng Qìchē Zhàn; % 0531 8594 1472;131 吉洛路; g K84）， 位于火车站以北约 3 公里处，但前往省内目的地的巴士也从济南广城汽车站（济南广城汽车站 ，Jǐnán Guǎngchéng Qìchēzhàn; % 8830 3030;车站街 22 号车站街 22 号 ） 火车站正对面。

TRAIN
火车

Ji’nan is a major hub in the east China rail system and has several busy train stations. The main, central train station, Jinan Train Station (济南站; Jǐnán Zhàn), has high-speed and regular trains. The vast majority of high-speed trains, though, use Jinan West Train Station (济南西站, Jǐnán Xīzhàn; Dajinzhuang Lu, 大金庄路; gK156).
济南是华东铁路系统的主要枢纽，拥有多个繁忙的火车站。济南站 （ 济南站 ;Jǐnán Zhàn） 有高速和定期列车。不过，绝大多数高铁都使用济南西站 （ 济南西站 ，Jǐnán Xīzhàn;Dajinzhuang Lu， 大金庄路 g K156）。

At Jinan Train Station, if you’re in a hurry and need to buy tickets, use the shorter queue in the far right-hand corner of the ticket office, which is reserved for military personal and other VIPs, but which will also sell tickets to foreigners. Staff rarely speak English, so come prepared. Same-day tickets are easy to come by for high-speed services to destinations within Shandong. For longer overnight services it’s a good idea to buy your ticket a day or two in advance.
在济南火车站，如果您赶时间需要购票，请使用售票处最右上角较短的队列，该排队是为军人和其他贵宾保留的，但也会向外国人出售车票。工作人员很少会说英语，所以要做好准备。当日票很容易买到前往山东境内目的地的高速服务。对于较长的过夜服务，最好提前一两天购买车票。

北京南 330/195 日元，两小时，每天 15 人（上午 7：13 至晚上 7：59）

Qingdao ¥194/120, two to three hours, 35 daily (5.53am to 8.11pm)
青岛 194/120 日元，2 至 3 小时，每天 35 小时（早上 5：53 至晚上 8：11）

8Getting Around
8 四处走走

TO/FROM THE AIRPORT
往返机场

Airport shuttle buses (¥20) run from the bus station opposite the train station (hourly, 5am to 8pm), and from outside Yuquan Simpson Hotel (玉泉森信大酒店, Yùquán Sēnxìn Dàjiǔdiàn; hourly, 6am to 7pm).
机场班车（20 日元）从火车站对面的巴士站（每小时一班，早上 5 点至晚上 8 点）和玉泉森信大酒店（玉泉森信大酒店 ，Yùquán Sēnxìn Dàjiǔdiàn，每小时一班，早上 6 点至晚上 7 点）出发。

PUBLIC TRANSPORT
公共交通

The useful bus K51 (¥2) runs from Jinan Train Station, past Baotu Spring and Quancheng Square, and on to Thousand Buddha Mountain and the hospital.
K51 路公交车（2 元）从济南火车站出发，经过趵突泉和泉城广场，然后前往千佛山和医院。

Bus K84 (¥2) goes from the train station to the main long-distance bus station.
K84 路公交车（2 日元）从火车站开往主要长途巴士站。

Bus K156 (¥2, 45 minutes) goes from Jinan Train Station to Jinan West Train Station.
K156 路公交车（2 日元，45 分钟）从济南火车站到济南西站。

TAXI
出租车

Taxis cost ¥8 for the first 3km then ¥1.75 (slightly more at night) per kilometre thereafter.
出租车前 3 公里 8 日元，此后每公里 1.75 日元（夜间稍高）。

Zhujiayu 朱家峪
朱家峪

%0531 / Pop 200
% 0531 / 流行 200

Eighty kilometres east of Ji’nan is one of Shandong’s oldest hamlets. Most of the stone buildings in Zhujiayu (Zhūjiāyù) date back to the Ming and Qing dynasties. Many have been spruced up in recent years to serve as movie and soap-opera sets, but much of the village’s historical authenticity has been preserved and strolling the stone-paved streets is still a journey back in time.
济南以东八十公里处是山东最古老的村庄之一。朱家峪（Zhūjiāyǹ）的大多数石头建筑都可以追溯到明清时期。近年来，许多教堂都经过了修饰，用作电影和肥皂剧的布景，但村庄的大部分历史真实性都得到了保留，漫步在石板铺成的街道上仍然是一次时光倒流之旅。

Zhujiayu and its bucolic panoramas of rolling hills can be explored in an easy day trip from Ji’nan, though staying overnight in a homestay is a treat. Admission to the village is ¥40. Signboards outside the notable buildings have information on them written in English.
从济南出发，可以在轻松的一日游中探索朱家峪及其连绵起伏的丘陵田园风光，但在寄宿家庭过夜也是一种享受。村庄的门票是 40 日元。著名建筑外的招牌上用英文写着信息。

Follow the Ming-dynasty, double-track ancient road (双轨古道, shuāngguǐ gǔdào) to the Qing-dynasty Wenchang Pavilion (文昌阁, Wénchāng Gé), an arched gate topped by a single-roofed shrine where teachers would take new pupils to make offerings to Confucius before their first lesson. On your left is Shanyin Primary School (山阴小学, Shānyīn Xiǎoxué). It closed as a school in the 1990s, but its halls and courtyards now house exhibits on local life.
沿着明代的双轨古道 （ 双轨古道 ，shuāngguǐ gǔdào）到达清代文昌阁 （ 文昌阁 ，Wénchāng Gé），这是一座拱形大门，顶部有一个单顶神龛，老师们会带着新生在第一堂课前向孔子供养。左边是山阴小学 。 它在 1990 年代作为一所学校关闭，但其大厅和庭院现在设有有关当地生活的展览。

Walk on to see the many ancestral temples, including the Zhu Family Ancestral Hall (朱氏家祠, Zhūshì Jiācí), the numerous packed mudbrick homesteads, and the quaint, arched shíqiáo (stone bridges). Near the top of village, the intriguing double bridge, known as the Kangxi Overpass (康熙立交桥, Kāngxī Lìjiāo Qiáo), is one of the earliest examples in the world of such a traffic structure and dates from 1671. A further 30-minute climb past the last drystone walls of the village will take you to the gleaming white Kuixing Pavilion (魁星楼, Kuíxīng Lóu), crowning the hill overlooking the village.
继续步行，参观许多祖庙，包括朱氏家祠（朱氏家祠 ，Zhūshì Jiācí），众多拥挤的泥砖宅基地，以及古色古香的拱形石桥 （石桥）。在村顶附近，一座迷人的双桥，被称为康熙立交桥（康熙立交桥 ，Kāngxī Lìjiāo Qiáo），是世界上最早的这种交通结构的例子之一，其历史可以追溯到 1671 年。再爬过村庄最后的干石墙 30 分钟，您将到达闪闪发光的白色奎星楼 （ 魁星楼 ，Kuíxīng Lóu），该楼位于俯瞰村庄的山丘上。

To really appreciate the charms of the village, it’s best to stay here overnight. There are plenty of homestay options; look for flags posting ‘农家乐’ (nóngjiālè) or ‘住宿’ (zhùsù). Gucun Inn (古村酒家, Gǔcūn Jiǔjiā; %0531 8380 8135; r ¥150; W) has clean, simple, spacious rooms in a courtyard house with chickens roaming the yard. The friendly Zhang family running the place also cook up delicious meals (dishes ¥10 to ¥40). It’s at the top of the village; walk under the Kangxi Overpass and take the low road at the split, following the bend to the left.
要真正领略村庄的魅力，最好在这里过夜。有很多寄宿家庭选择;寻找标有“ 农家乐 ”或“ 住宿 ”（zhùsù） 的旗帜。 古村酒家 （Gǔcūn Jiǔjiā; % 0531 8380 8135;150 日元; W ） 在四合院里有干净、简单、宽敞的房间，鸡在院子里漫步。友好的张家经营这家餐厅，他们也烹制了美味的饭菜（菜肴 10 至 40 日元）。它位于村庄的顶端;走在康熙立交桥下，走岔路口的低路，沿着左边的弯道走。

Numerous villagers have turned their homes into makeshift restaurants (often these are homestays too). You won’t find any English menus. Dishes to look for include làjiāo chǎo ròu (辣椒炒肉, pork fried with mild green chillies), tǔdòu sī (土豆丝, light-fried potato shreds) and fēngwèi qiézi (风味茄子, braised aubergine). Mop up your sauce with big fluffy mántou (馒头, steamed buns), which are often preferred to rice here.
许多村民将他们的家变成了临时餐馆（通常这些也是寄宿家庭）。您不会找到任何英文菜单。值得寻找的菜肴包括 làjiāo chǎo ròu（ 辣椒炒肉 ，用温和的青辣椒炒猪肉）、tǔdòu sī（ 土豆丝 ，轻炸土豆丝）和 fēngwèi qiézi（ 风味茄子 ，红烧茄子）。用蓬松的大馒头（馒头，馒头 ）擦掉酱汁，在这里，馒头通常比米饭更受欢迎。

To get here from Ji’nan, catch bus K301 (¥9, 1½ hours, 7am to 6.30pm) from the Qiān Fóshān (千佛山) bus stop on Jing Shilu, and get off at the terminus stop, Jìshī Xuéyuàn (技师学院). From there take bus 9 two stops to Zhūjiāyù (朱家峪), from where its a straight, 20-minute, 2km-walk to the village. If you manage to find a lift up to the village from the main road, the going rate is ¥5. Returning, the last bus 9 leaves at around 6pm (6.30pm in summer).
从济南出发，从京石路千佛山公交站乘坐 K301 路公交车（9 日元，1 小时半，早上 7 点至下午 6 点 30 分），在终点站技师学院下车。从那里乘坐 9 路公交车两站到达朱家峪 ，从那里直行 20 分钟，步行 2 公里即可到达村庄。如果您设法从主干道找到电梯到村庄，费用为 5 日元。返回后，最后一班 9 路公交车在下午 6 点左右（夏季为下午 6.30）发车。

Tai’an 泰安
Tai’an 泰安

%0538 / Pop 1.7 million
% 0538 / 人口 170 万

The gateway to Tai Shan’s sacred slopes is the town of Tai’an (Tài’ān), which has had a tourist industry in full swing since before the Ming dynasty. In the 17th century, historian Zhang Dai described package tours that included choice of lodging (enormous inns with more than 20 kitchens and hundreds of servants, opera performers and courtesans), a post-summit congratulatory banquet, plus an optional sedan-chair upgrade (climbing tax not included).
通往泰山神山的门户是泰安镇（泰安镇），自明代之前以来，这里的旅游业就如火如荼。17世纪，历史学家张岱描述了旅行团，其中包括住宿选择（拥有20多个厨房和数百名仆人、戏曲演员和的大型旅馆）、峰会后的祝贺宴会，以及可选的轿椅升级（不含登山税）。

1Sights
1 景点

oDai TempleTAOIST TEMPLE
o 岱庙道观

(map Google map; 岱庙, Dài Miào; Daimiao Beijie, 岱庙北街; ¥20 or free entrance with Tai Shan ticket; h8am-6pm summer, to 5pm winter)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 岱庙 ，Dài Miào;岱庙北街， 岱庙北街 ;20 日元或凭大山门票免费入场; h 夏季上午 8 点至下午 6 点，冬季至下午 5 点）

This magnificent Taoist temple complex is where all Tai’an roads lead, being the traditional first stop on the pilgrimage route up Tai Shan. The grounds, enclosed within mighty walls, are an impressive example of Song-dynasty (960–1127) temple construction with features of an imperial palace, though other structures stood here 1000 years before that.
这座宏伟的道观建筑群是泰安所有道路的通向，是通往泰山朝圣路线的传统第一站。庭院被雄伟的城墙包围，是宋代（960-1127 年）寺庙建筑的一个令人印象深刻的例子，具有皇宫的特征，尽管其他建筑在此之前 1000 年就矗立在这里。

Many visitors enter from the north through Hou Zai gate map Google map (后载门, Hòu Zài Mén) (which you can climb for views of Tai Shan), but entering from the south through Zhengyang gate map Google map (正阳门, Zhèngyáng Mén; Dongyue Dajie, 东岳大街) allows you to follow the traditional passage through the main temple and up Hongmen Lu to the start of Tai Shan’s Central Route ascent.
许多游客从北面通过后载门地图进入 谷歌地图 （ 后载门 ，Hòu Zài Mén）（ 您可以爬上去欣赏大山的景色），但从南面通过正阳门地图进入 谷歌地图 （ 正阳门 ，Zhèngyáng Mén;东岳大街） 允许您沿着传统的通道穿过主庙，登上鸿门路，到达泰山中央路线上升的起点。

From the south end, two lions watch cars pass by on Dongyue Dajie, flanking the splendid páifāng (ornamental arch). Beyond this and the Zhengyang gate is the Yaocan Pavilion map Google map (遥参亭, Yáocān Tíng; h6.30am-6pm).
从南端，两只狮子在东岳大街上观看汽车经过，两侧是华丽的 páifāng（装饰拱门）。再往前和正阳门就是瑶参阁地图谷歌地图 （ 遥参亭 ，Yáocān Tíng; h 早上 6.30 点至下午 6 点）。

Between the buildings, the courtyards are filled with prized examples of poetry and imperial records. Fossilised-looking bìxì (the mythical tortoise son of the dragon), dating from the 12th century onwards, carry stelae on their backs documenting everything from the civil exam process to emperors’ birthdays. The Han Emperor Wudi himself is said to have planted some of the massive, twisting trees in the Cypress Tree Pavilion 2100 years ago.
在建筑之间，庭院里摆满了珍贵的诗歌和皇家记录。bìxì（神话中的龙之子）的化石可追溯到 12 世纪以来，背上带有石碑，记录了从民事考试过程到皇帝生日的一切。据说汉武帝本人在 2100 年前在柏树亭中种植了一些巨大的、扭曲的树木。

The main hall is the colossal Hall of Heavenly Blessing map Google map (天贶殿, Tiānkuàng Diàn), which dates from AD 1009, and whose dark interior houses an exquisite, 62m-long Song-dynasty mural depicting a journey undertaken by Emperor Zhenzong as the Lord of Tai Shan, the god of longevity to whom the entire complex is dedicated.
正殿是巨大的天祈福殿地图谷歌地图 （ 天贶殿 ，Tiānkuàng Diàn）， 其历史可追溯至公元 1009 年，其黑暗的内部有一幅精美的 62 米长的宋代壁画，描绘了真宗皇帝作为泰山之主的旅程，泰山之主是整个建筑群都供奉着他的长寿之神。

Rock Valley ScriptureLANDMARK
岩谷经文置地广场

(map Google map; 经石峪, Jīngshí Yù)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 经石峪 ，Jīngshí Yù）

Located along the first part of the climb up Tai Shan, this massive inscription of a Buddhist text on the rock face was once hidden behind a waterfall.
位于登上大山的第一部分，这座巨大的岩壁上铭文曾经隐藏在瀑布后面。

4Sleeping
4 睡眠

Since you will need at least a full day to explore the mountain, spending the night in Tai’an or at the summit is advised. It’s cheaper and more comfortable to sleep in Tai’an, and there’s far more choice, although staying on the mountain naturally has its own appeal.
由于您至少需要一整天的时间来探索这座山，因此建议您在泰安或山顶过夜。在泰安睡觉更便宜、更舒适，选择也多得多，虽然住在山上自然有其自身的吸引力。

Taishan International Youth HostelHOSTEL¥
泰山国际青年旅舍 HOSTEL¥

(map Google map; 泰山国际青年旅舍, Tàishān Guójì Qīngnián Lǚshè; %0538 628 5196; 65 Tongtian Jie, 通天街65号; dm ¥45-65, r from ¥138; aiW; g1, 4, 7, 8, 17)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 泰山国际青年旅舍 ， Tàishān Guójì Qīngnián Lǚshè; % 0538 628 5196; 通天街 65 号通天街 65 号 ; dm ¥45-65， r ¥138 起; a i W g 1、4、7、8、17）

This large youth hostel has clean, spacious rooms with pine furnishings and nice firm beds. Staff are very helpful and the location is ideal. Free laundry and a chilled-out ground-floor common area, where you can get beers, cocktails and fresh coffee, add to the experience. Look for the pair of arches just off Tongtian Jie.
这家大型青年旅舍拥有干净宽敞的客房，配有松木家具和漂亮的硬床。工作人员非常乐于助人，位置非常理想。免费洗衣房和凉爽的底层公共区域，您可以在那里享用啤酒、鸡尾酒和新鲜咖啡，为体验增添色彩。寻找通天界附近的一对拱门。

Yuzuo HotelHOTEL¥¥
柚子酒店 HOTEL¥¥

(map Google map; 御座宾馆, Yùzuò Bīnguǎn; %0538 826 9999; www.yuzuo.cn; 50 Daimiao Beilu, 岱庙北路50号; r incl breakfast from ¥390; aW; g4, 6)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 御座宾馆 ，Yùzuò Bīnguǎn; % 0538 826 9999;www.yuzuo.cn;岱庙北路 50 号， 岱庙北路 50 号 ;含早餐¥390 起; a W g 4、6）

This attractive hotel beside Dai Temple’s north gate, and within the temple’s outer walls, was purposely kept to two storeys out of respect for its revered neighbour. Rooms are dotted around the grounds in stand-alone villas. The deluxe ones are decked out imperial style; cheaper rooms are rather ordinary, but very comfortable nonetheless. Not much English spoken, but what a location.
这家迷人的酒店位于大寺北门旁，寺庙的外墙内，出于对其受人尊敬的邻居的尊重，特意保留在两层楼。客房散布在独立别墅的场地上。豪华的装饰是帝国风格的;便宜的房间相当普通，但仍然非常舒适。英语说得不多，但位置真好。

Home Inn PlusHOTEL¥¥
如家酒店¥¥

(map Google map; 如家精选, Rújiā Jīngxuǎn; %0538 822 5888; 26 Red Gate Rd, 红门路26号; r from ¥398; aW; gK3)

This midrange branch of the budget chain Home Inn has slick, modern rooms and a handy location close to Tai Shan’s main entrance. Breakfast costs ¥25 per person.
这家经济型连锁店如家酒店的中档分店拥有时尚、现代的客房，位置便利，靠近大山的正门。早餐每人收费¥25。

Shānxī HuìguǎnBOUTIQUE HOTEL¥¥¥
山溪惠观精品酒店 ¥¥¥

(map Google map; 山西会馆; %134 4265 4515; 89 Hongmen Lu, 红门路89号; dm ¥40, r from ¥500; aW; gK3, K37)

The excellent former Hongmen International Youth Hostel – housed within the charming courtyards of an old guild hall once attached to Guandi Temple – was being renovated by new owners at the time of research, but it promises to still be a magical place to stay. Private rooms with modern interiors will go for around ¥500 and a large dorm will have beds for around ¥40.
优秀的前鸿门国际青年旅舍——坐落在曾经附属于关帝寺的旧会馆的迷人庭院内——在研究时，新主人正在进行翻修，但它有望仍然是一个神奇的住宿地点。拥有现代内饰的私人房间价格约为 500 日元，大宿舍的床位约为 40 日元。

5Eating
5 吃

There is a couple of fairly lively street-food markets in Tai’an. The night market map Google map (夜市, Yèshì; Naihe Donglu, 奈河东路; snacks from ¥10; h5.30pm-11pm), which stretches along the Nai River’s east bank, is mostly clothing and souvenirs, but there are plenty of snack stalls and small restaurants too. On the other side of Dai Temple, you’ll find mántóu (馒头, steamed buns), various meats on skewers, fried chicken and more at the low-key Dai Bei Market map Google map (贷北市场, Dàiběi Shìchǎng; Daimiao Beijie, 岱庙北街).
泰安有几个相当热闹的街头小吃市场。 夜市地图谷歌地图 （ 夜市 ，Yèshì;奈河东路，奈河东路 ;小吃 10 元起; h 下午 5.30 至晚上 11 点） 沿着奈河东岸延伸，主要是服装和纪念品，但也有很多小吃摊和小餐馆。在岱庙的另一边，您可以在低调的岱贝市场地图上找到馒头 、各种肉串、炸鸡等 Google map（ 贷北市场 ， Dàiběi Shìchǎng;岱庙北街 ）。

Jiānbing GuǒziPANCAKES¥
Jiānbing Guǒzi 煎饼 ¥

(map Google map; 煎饼果子; Yunzhou Jie, off Dongyua Dajie, 东岳大街云舟街; ¥5; h5.30am-7pm)

You find jiānbing (savoury pancakes sprinkled with chives, coriander, spring onion and a light chilli sauce) all over northern China, but Tai Shan folk are particularly proud of theirs, which they wrap around yóu tiáo (油条, fried dough sticks). Mrs Li fires up her pancake griddle from 5.30am and serves jiānbing all day.
中国北方随处可见 jiānbing（撒上细香葱、香菜、葱和淡辣椒酱的咸味煎饼），但大山人对他们的煎饼特别自豪，他们用油条包裹着油条 。 李太太从早上 5 点 30 分开始点燃煎饼煎锅，全天供应煎饼。

Lǐjì MiànguǎnNOODLES¥
Lǐjì Miànguǎn 面条 ¥

(map Google map; 李记面馆; Yunzhou Jie, off Dongyua Dajie, 东岳大街云舟街; noodles ¥8-15; h7am-10pm)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 李记面馆 ;云州街，东岳大街云舟街 ; 面条 ¥8-15; h 上午 7 点至晚上 10 点）

This no-frills noodle shack is one of numerous noodle joints on and around the nonsignposted lane Yunzhou Jie (云舟街), out the back of Tai Shan International Youth Hostel. As with all of them, there’s no English menu, but tasty offerings include hóngshāo niúròu miàn (红烧牛肉面, braised beef noodles), dāo xiāo miàn (刀削面, knife-sliced noodles with pork) and chǎo miàn (炒面, vegetable fried noodles).
这家朴素的面馆是大山国际青年旅舍后面云舟街无路标巷及其周边众多面馆之一。与所有餐厅一样，没有英文菜单，但美味的菜肴包括 hóngshāo niúròu miàn（ 红烧牛肉面 ，红烧牛肉面）、dāo xiāo miàn（ 刀削面 ，猪肉刀片面）和 chǎo miàn（ 炒面 ，蔬菜炒面）。

Beijing DaoxiangcunSNACKS¥
北京稻香村小吃 ¥

(map Google map; 稻香村, Dàoxiāngcūn; 90 Qingnian Lu, 青年路90号; around ¥3 per piece; h9am-9pm)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 稻香村 ，Dàoxiāngcūn;90 Qingnian Lu， 青年路 90 号 ;每件约¥3; h 上午 9 点至晚上 9 点）

Beijing’s most famous brand of sweetmeat pastries, Daoxiangcun offers ideal rucksack fillers for your hike up Tai Shan. The flaky pastries have candied fruit fillings and are sold in biscuit-sized pieces (you’ll get four or five for around ¥10) that you can mix and match.
作为北京最著名的甜肉糕点品牌，稻香村为您的大山徒步旅行提供理想的背包填充物。片状糕点里有蜜饯馅料，以饼干大小的块出售（4 到 5 个，价格约为 10 日元），您可以混合搭配。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

Whether by road or track, most routes pass through Ji’nan, 80km north.
无论是公路还是轨道，大部分路线都经过以北80公里的济南。

It’s easy to buy same-day train and bus tickets from the stations themselves, as long as you come armed with a few Chinese phrases.
从车站本身购买当日火车票和公共汽车票很容易，只要你带上一些中文短语。

BUS
总线

Tai’an Bus Station (泰安汽车总站, Tài’ān Qìchē Zǒngzhàn; %0538 218 8777; cnr Tài’shān Dalu & Longtan Lu, 泰山大路龙潭路的路口) is a short walk south of Tai Shan Train Station. Destinations include the following:
泰安汽车总站（Tai'an Bus Station， Tài'ān Qìchē Zǒngzhàn; % 0538 218 8777;泰山大路龙潭路的路口 ，位于大山火车站以南仅几步之遥。目的地包括以下内容：

TRAIN
火车

Two train stations service this region. Tai Shan Train Station (泰山火车站, Tàishān Huǒchē Zhàn; %0538 688 7358; cnr Dongyue Dajie & Longtan Lu, 东岳大街龙潭路的路口) is more central, but high-speed trains use Tai’an Train Station (高铁泰安站, Gāotiě Tài’ān Zhàn; also known as Gāotiě Zhàn, 高铁站; High-Speed Train Station Xingaotiezhan Lu, 新高铁站路), 9km west of the town centre. Local bus 68 connects the two stations.
两个火车站为该地区提供服务。 泰山火车站（Tai Shan Train Station， Tàishān Huǒchē Zhàn; % 0538 688 7358;东岳大街龙潭路的路口，东岳大街龙潭路的路口 ， 但高铁使用泰安火车站 （ 高铁泰安站 ，Gāotiě Tài'ān， Zhàn; 也称为高铁站; 高铁站路 ， 新高铁站路 ）， 位于市中心以西 9 公里处。当地公交车 68 路连接两个车站。

Tai Shan 泰山
泰山

%0538

The most climbed mountain on earth, and the most revered of China’s five sacred Taoist peaks, Unesco-protected Tai Shan (泰山, Tài Shān; www.taishangeopark.com; ¥115) is one-third of Shandong’s claim to having ‘yī shān, yī shuǐ, yī shèngrén’ (一山一水一圣人, ‘one mountain, one water, one saint’); the water being the Yellow River and the saint being Confucius. You may have to share it with the masses – its supernatural allure attracts the Chinese in droves – but a pilgrimage hike to Tai Shan’s summit is a unique experience few people forget.
被联合国教科文组织保护的泰山 （ 泰山 ，Tài Shān;www.taishangeopark.com;¥115） 是山东声称拥有“ 一山一水一圣人 ，”一山一水，一圣人“的三分之一;水是黄河，圣人是孔子。你可能不得不与大众分享它——它的超自然魅力吸引了成群结队的中国人——但徒步前往大山山顶的朝圣之旅是一次很少有人忘记的独特体验。

Qin Shi Huang, the first emperor, chose the summit of Tai Shan to proclaim the unified kingdom of China in 219 BC. And from its heights Confucius uttered the dictum: ‘The world is small’. You too can climb up and say: ‘I’m knackered.’
秦始皇，始皇帝，在公元前219年，选择了泰山的顶峰，宣布中华大一统。孔子从高处说出了一句格言：“世界很小”。你也可以爬上去说：'我被打败了。

Pilgrims – young, old and very old – still make their way up the steps as a symbol of their devotion to Taoist and Buddhist teachings. It is said that if you climb Tai Shan, you will live to see 100.
朝圣者——无论年轻、年老还是年老——仍然会走上台阶，以象征他们对道教和佛教教义的虔诚。都说登上太山，活到见百。

Beyond Qin Shi Huang, 71 other emperors and countless figures also paid this mountain their respects. To follow in their footsteps, there are four routes up to the highest peak (1532m) that can be done on foot: Central Route, historically the Emperor’s Route, winds 8.9km from Dai Temple to the summit and gains 1400m in elevation; Peach Blossom Park Route climbs 13km on the west side; and the least travelled 5.4km Tianzhu Peak Route goes up the back of the mountain from the east. Western Route follows the 14km shuttle-bus route and converges with the Central Route at the halfway point (Midway Gate to Heaven), from where it’s another 3.5km up steep steps to the summit.
除了秦始皇之外，其他 71 位皇帝和无数人物也都向这座山致敬。为了追随他们的脚步，有四条路线可以步行到达最高峰（1532 米）： 中央路线 ，历史上是皇帝之路，从大寺蜿蜒到山顶，全长 8.9 公里，海拔 1400 米; 桃花公园路线西侧爬升 13 公里;而人迹最少的 5.4 公里天竺峰路线 ，从东边沿着山后上。 西线沿着 14 公里的穿梭巴士路线，在中途与中线（天堂中途门）汇合，从那里再爬 3.5 公里的陡峭台阶到达山顶。

If this sounds like too much for your knees, there are alternatives: cover the Western Route by bus to Midway Gate to Heaven and then take the cable car to South Gate to Heaven near the summit. Reverse the journey or nab a bus to get back down.
如果这听起来对您的膝盖来说太过分了，还有其他选择：乘坐巴士前往天堂中途岛门，然后乘坐缆车前往山顶附近的天堂南门。倒车或搭乘公共汽车返回。

Sights on the mountain close around 5pm. Weather can change suddenly and the summit gets very bitter, windy and wet, so bring warm layers and rain gear. Comfortable trainers are the best footwear: you don’t want to be dragging heavyweight boots all the way to the top, and all the trails are laid with concrete steps in any case. You can buy brightly coloured rain ponchos and, at the top, rent overcoats (¥30).
山上的景点在下午 5 点左右关闭。天气可能会突然变化，山顶会变得非常苦涩、多风和潮湿，因此请带上保暖的衣服和雨具。舒适的运动鞋是最好的鞋子：你不想把重量级的靴子一直拖到顶部，而且无论如何，所有的小径都是用混凝土台阶铺设的。您可以购买颜色鲜艳的雨披，还可以租用大衣（30 日元）。

As with all Chinese mountain hikes, viewing the sunrise is considered an integral part of the experience. You can either do a night hike (with torches – this is very popular) or, easier, stay overnight at one of the summit guesthouses to greet the first rays of dawn.
与所有中国登山徒步旅行一样，观看日出被认为是体验中不可或缺的一部分。您可以进行夜间徒步旅行（使用手电筒 - 这非常受欢迎），或者更轻松的是，在山顶的宾馆之一过夜，迎接第一缕黎明。

Tai Shan
泰山

Climbing Tai Shan
攀登大山

The entrance ticket for Tai Shan costs ¥115 and is good for three days. It also grants you entrance to Dai Temple, which otherwise costs ¥20. Queues at the main Central Route ticket office (售票处, Shòupiào Chù; %0538 806 6077; ¥115; h24hr), part way up the mountain beside Wanxian Tower, can be long and very slow. You can save yourself a lot of queuing time by buying your Tai Shan ticket at Dai Temple.
大山的门票价格为 115 日元，有效期为三天。它还允许您进入大寺，否则费用为 20 日元。 中央线主要售票处 （ 售票处 ， Shòupiào Chù; % 0538 806 6077;115 日元; h 24 小时）， 在万仙楼旁边的半山上，可能会很长而且很慢。您可以在大寺购买大山门票，从而节省大量排队时间。

If you’re taking a shuttle bus up the Western Route, you’ll have to buy your Tai Shan ticket with your bus ticket (¥30 one way). If you walk the Western Route you often don’t have to buy the Tai Shan ticket because there is no one there to check tickets.
如果您乘坐西线穿梭巴士，则必须将大山车票与巴士票一起购买（单程 30 日元）。如果你走西线，通常不用买台山票，因为那里没有人查票。

2Central Route
2 中央路线

The Central Route has been the main route up the mountain since the 3rd century BC, and over the past two millennia a bewildering number of bridges, trees, rivers, gullies, inscriptions, caves, pavilions and temples have become famous sites in their own right. As with all the routes, it’s well paved so you won’t need sherpas, climbing ropes, crampons or oxygen, but don’t underestimate the challenge of its 7000 knee-wrenching steps. If you’re fit you can easily climb up in four hours and down in three, but most people take more like six hours to get to the top.
自公元前 3 世纪以来，中央路线一直是上山的主要路线，在过去的两千年里，数量令人眼花缭乱的桥梁、树木、河流、沟壑、铭文、洞穴、亭台楼阁和寺庙本身已成为著名的景点。与所有路线一样，它铺设得很好，因此您不需要夏尔巴人、攀岩绳、冰爪或氧气，但不要低估其 7000 级令人膝盖紧张的台阶的挑战。如果你身体健康，你可以在四个小时内轻松爬上去，在三个小时内爬下，但大多数人需要大约六个小时才能到达山顶。

Tai Shan also functions as an outdoor museum of antiquities. Two of the most prized are Rock Valley Scripture, in the first part of the climb, a massive inscription of a Buddhist text that was once hidden behind a waterfall, and North Prayer Rock (拱北石; Gǒngběi Shí), a huge boulder pointing skyward and a site of imperial sacrifices to heaven, at the summit.
大山还是一个户外古物博物馆。其中最珍贵的两本是攀登的第一部分的 《岩谷经 》，这是曾经隐藏在瀑布后面的佛教经典的巨大铭文，以及北祈祷岩 （ 拱北石 ;Gǒngběi Shí），这是一块指向天空的巨石，也是皇帝祭祀天堂的地点，位于山顶。

Purists begin with a south–north perambulation through Dai Temple, 1.7km south of the actual ascent, in accordance with imperial tradition, but there is no shame in starting at the bus stop by Guandi Temple map Google map (关帝庙, Guāndì Miào), the first of many dedicated to the Taoist protector of peace, and one that houses a charming old theatre stage dating from 1671. Passing First Gate of Heaven map Google map (一天门, Yītiān Mén) marks the start of the incline, though the ticket office is still a way further at Wanxian Tower map Google map (万仙楼, Wàn Xiān Lóu). The Red Gate Palace map Google map (红门宫, Hóng Mén Gōng) is the first of a series of temples dedicated to Bixia – the Heavenly Jade Maiden – daughter of the god of Tai Shan.
纯粹主义者按照皇室传统，从南向北漫步穿过大寺，在实际攀登以南 1.7 公里处，但从关帝庙地图的巴士站开始并不丢人 谷歌地图 （ 关帝庙 Guāndì Miào）， 这是众多供奉道教和平保护者中的第一个，其中有一个可追溯至 1671 年的迷人古老剧院舞台。经过第一天门地图 谷歌地图 （ 一天门 Yītiān Mén） 标志着斜坡的起点，尽管售票处在万仙楼地图 谷歌地图 （ 万仙楼 ，Wàn Xiān Lóu） 处还有一段路。 红门宫地图 （ 红门宫 Hóng Mén Gōng） 是供奉太山神的女儿碧霞（天玉少女）的一系列寺庙中的第一座。

Consider taking a detour into the Geoheritage Scenic Area map Google map (地质园区, Dìzhí Yuánqū) for a look at unusual radial rock formations that mesmerised Confucius himself. Back on the main path is the Doumu Hall map Google map (斗母宫, Dǒumǔ Gōng), dedicated to the Taoist Mother of the Big Dipper, first constructed in 1542 under the name ‘Dragon Spring Nunnery’. Continue through the tunnel of cypresses known as Cypress Cave map Google map (柏洞; Bó Dòng) to Baulking Horse Ridge (迴馬嶺, Huímǎ Lǐng), which marks the point where Emperor Zhenzong had to dismount and continue by litter because his horse refused to go further.
考虑绕道进入地质遗产景区地图 Google map（ 地质园区 Dìzhí Yuánqū）， 看看让孔子本人着迷的不寻常的放射状岩层。回到主路上是斗母殿地图谷歌地图 （ 斗母宫 Dǒumǔ Gōng）， 供奉道教的北斗七星之母，始建于 1542 年，当时名为“龙泉尼姑庵”。继续穿过被称为柏树洞地图的柏树隧道 谷歌地图 （ 柏洞 ;Bó Dòng） 到鲍尔金马岭 （ 迴馬嶺 ，Huímǎ Lǐng）， 这标志着真宗皇帝因为他的马拒绝走得更远而不得不下马并继续前进。

The Midway Gate to Heaven map Google map (中天门, Zhōng Tiān Mén) marks the point where shuttle buses arrive from Tianwai Village and where some hikers, seeing the mountain steps disappearing into the clouds, make a run for the cable car. Don’t give up! Rest your legs, visit the small and smoky God of Wealth Temple map Google map (财神庙, Cáishén Miào) to seek inspiration and strength, and stock up on calorific snacks.
中途天门地图谷歌地图 （ 中天门 Zhōng Tiān Mén） 标志着穿梭巴士从天外村到达的地点，一些徒步旅行者看到山阶消失在云层中，跑向缆车。不要放弃！休息双腿，参观小而烟雾缭绕的财神庙地图谷歌地图 （ 财神庙 Cáishén Miào） 寻求灵感和力量，并储备热量零食。

If you decide to make a float for the summit, the main cable car (空中索道, Kōngzhōng Suǒdào; one way/return ¥100/200; h7.30am-6.30pm 16 Apr-15 Oct, 8.30am-5pm 16 Oct-15 Apr) is a 15-minute ride to Moon View Peak (月观峰, Yuèguān Fēng) at the South Gate to Heaven. Be warned: peak-season and weekend queues can take two hours. Also, the cable car stops when there is any risk of lightning.
如果您决定为山顶制作花车，则主要缆车 （ 空中索道 ，Kōngzhōng Suǒdào;单程/往返 100/200 日元; h 4 月 16 日至 10 月 15 日上午 7 时 30 分至下午 6 时 30 分，10 月 16 日至 4 月 15 日上午 8 时 30 分至下午 5 时 ）距离天堂南门的月观峰 （ 月观峰 ，Yuèguān Fēng）有 15 分钟车程。请注意：旺季和周末排队可能需要两个小时。此外，当有任何闪电风险时，缆车会停止。

If you continue on foot you’ll come next to Cloud Step Bridge map Google map (云步桥; Yúnbù Qiáo), once a modest wooden bridge spanning a torrent of waterfalls, and the withered and wiry Wudafu Pine (五大夫松, Wǔdàfū Sǒng), under which Emperor Qin Shi Huang, overtaken by a violent storm, sought shelter. Across the valley, each character carved in the Ten-Thousand Zhang Tablet map Google map (万丈碑, Wànzhàng Bēi), dated 1748, measures 1m across.
如果你继续步行，你会来到云步桥地图谷歌地图 （ 云步桥 Yúnbù Qiáo） 旁边，曾经是一座横跨瀑布洪流的朴素木桥，以及枯萎而结实的五大夫松（五大夫松 ，Wǔdàfū Sǒng），秦始皇在暴风雨中寻求庇护。在山谷的对面，1748 年的万丈碑地图谷歌地图 （ 万丈碑 Wànzhàng Bēi） 中雕刻的每个字符都宽 1 米。

You’ll pass Opposing Pines Pavilion map Google map (对松亭, Duìsōng Tíng) and then finally reach the arduous Path of 18 Bends map Google map (十八盘, Shíbāpán), a 400m extremely steep ascent to the mountain’s false summit. If you have the energy, see if you can spot the small shrine dedicated to the Lord of Tai Shan’s grandmother along the way. There is an alternative route to the Azure Clouds Temple here via another steep, narrow staircase to the right. If you continue on the main route, at the top is the Archway to Immortality map Google map (升仙坊, Shēngxiān Fāng), once believed to bestow immortality on those dedicated enough to reach it.
您将经过对松亭地图 Google map（ 对松亭 ，Duìsōng Tíng）， 最后到达艰苦的十八弯之路地图 Google map（ 十八盘 ，Shíbāpán）， 一段 400 米的极其陡峭的山顶。如果你有精力，看看沿途是否能看到供奉泰山主祖母的小神社。这里还有一条通往蔚蓝云神庙的替代路线，通过右侧另一段陡峭而狭窄的楼梯。如果你继续沿着主路线走，顶部是通往永生的拱门地图谷歌地图 （ 升仙坊 Shēngxiān Fāng）， 曾经被认为可以赋予那些足够虔诚的人长生不老。

The final short but very steep stretch takes you to the South Gate to Heaven map Google map (南天门, Nán Tián Mén), the third celestial gate, which marks the beginning of the summit area. Bear right up some steps onto Tian Jie (天街), the main strip, and pass through the gate to reach the sublimely perched Azure Clouds Temple map Google map (碧霞祠, Bìxiá Cí; h8am-5.15pm) F, dedicated to Bixia.
最后一段短而陡峭的路段将带您到达南天门地图谷歌地图 （ 南天门 ，Nán Tián Mén）， 第三扇天门，标志着山顶区域的开始。沿着几级台阶进入主干道天街 ，穿过大门，到达崇高的蔚蓝云寺地图谷歌地图 （ 碧霞祠 ，Bìxiá Cí; h 上午 8 点至下午 5 点 15 分）， F 献给 Bixia。

You have to climb higher to get to the Confucius Temple map Google map (孔庙, Kǒng Miào), where statues of Confucius, Mencius, Zengzi and other Confucian luminaries are venerated. The Taoist Qingdi Palace map Google map (青帝宫, Qīngdì Gōng) is right before the fog- and cloud-swathed Jade Emperor Temple map Google map (玉皇顶, Yùhuáng Dǐng), which stands at the summit, the highest point of the Tai Shan plateau.
你必须爬得更高才能到达孔庙地图 （ 孔庙 ，Kǒng Miào）， 那里供奉着孔子、孟子、曾子和其他儒家名人的雕像。道教青帝宫地图 （ 青帝宫 ，Qīngdì Gōng） 就在云雾缭绕的玉皇庙地图 （ 玉皇顶 Yùhuáng Dǐng） 前面，它矗立在泰山高原的最高点山顶。

The main sunrise vantage point is the North Pointing Rock map Google map (拱北石, Gǒngběi Shí); if you’re lucky, visibility extends over 200km to the coast.
主要的日出有利位置是北指岩地图谷歌地图 （ 拱北石 ，Gǒngběi Shí）; 如果幸运的话，能见度可以延伸到 200 多公里的海岸。

At the summit, you can see another (far quieter) side of the mountain by descending via the Tianzhu Peak or Peach Blossom Park Route.
在山顶，您可以通过天竺峰或桃花公园路线下山，看到山的另一面（安静得多）。

2Western Route
2 西线

The most popular way to descend is by bus via the Western Route. These buses are also very handy for night hikes up to catch the sunrise; they zip every 20 minutes (less frequently at night) between Tianwai Village (one way ¥30; h6am-6pm & midnight-2am peak, 7am-6pm off-peak) and Midway Gate to Heaven, not stopping in between.
最受欢迎的下山方式是乘坐巴士通过西线。这些巴士对于夜间徒步旅行看日出也非常方便;它们每 20 分钟一班（夜间班次较少）往返于天外村之间（单程 30 日元; h 早上 6 点至下午 6 点和午夜至凌晨 2 点高峰期，上午 7 点至下午 6 点非高峰期） 和天堂中途岛门 ，中间不停下来。

Walking the route is not so pleasant as the poorly marked footpath is closed off in parts, and often intercepts or coincides with the road, but it rewards you with a variety of scenic orchards and pools, and you can usually get away without paying the Tai Shan entrance fee if you walk this route. At the mountain’s base, Pervading Light Temple map Google map (普照寺, Pǔzhào Sì; ¥5; h8am-5.30pm) is a serene Buddhist temple dating from the Southern and Northern dynasties (420–589). The main attraction is Black Dragon Pool map Google map (黑龙潭, Hēilóng Tán), just below Longevity Bridge map Google map (长寿桥, Chángshòu Qiáo).
走这条路线并不那么愉快，因为标记不清的人行道部分封闭，经常与道路截断或重合，但它奖励你各种风景优美的果园和游泳池，如果你走这条路线，你通常可以不用支付大山门票。在山脚下， 弥漫光寺地图 Google map（ 普照寺 ，Pǔzhào Sì;5 日元; h 上午 8 点至下午 5.30）是一座宁静的佛教寺庙，其历史可追溯至南北朝（420-589 年）。主要景点是黑龙潭地图谷歌地图 （ 黑龙潭 Hēilóng Tán）， 就在长寿桥地图谷歌地图 （ 长寿桥 Chángshòu Qiáo） 下方。

2Tianzhu Peak Route
2 天竺峰路线

The less-travelled route through the Tianzhu Peak Scenic Area (天烛峰景区; Tiānzhú Fēng Jǐngqū) offers a rare chance to experience Tai Shan without the crowds. It’s largely ancient pine forest, ruins and peaks back there, so consider combining it with the Central Route for an entirely different view.
人迹罕至的天柱峰景区 （ 天烛峰景区 ;Tiānzhú Fēng Jǐngqū）提供了一个难得的机会，可以在没有人群的情况下体验大山。那里主要是古老的松树林、废墟和山峰，因此可以考虑将其与中央路线结合起来，以获得完全不同的景色。

If you ascend this way, get an early start to the trailhead, which is 15km by bus 19 (¥2) from Tai Shan’s Tianwai Village or Hongmen bus stops. The challenging climb itself can take five hours.
如果您沿着这条路上山，可以早点到达登山口，从大山的天外村或洪门巴士站乘坐 19 路公交车（2 日元）15 公里。具有挑战性的攀登本身可能需要五个小时。

It’s 5.4km from the trailhead to the short Rear Rocky Recess Cable Car (后石坞索道, Hòu Shíwù suǒdào; %0538 833 0765; one way ¥20; h8.30am-5pm Apr-Oct, closed Nov-Mar), which takes you from the back of the mountain to the North Gate to Heaven map Google map (北天门, Běi Tiānmén) and views of Tianzhu Peak.
从登山口到短途后石坞索道（后石坞索道 ，Hòu Shíwù suǒdào; % 0538 833 0765;单程 20 日元; h 4 月至 10 月上午 8.30 至下午 5 点，11 月至 3 月关闭）， 带您从山后前往北门天堂地图 Google 地图 （ 北天门 Běi Tiānmén） 并欣赏天竺峰的景色。

2Peach Blossom Park Route
2 桃花公园路线

This route to the summit passes through a scenic valley of striking geological formations and trees that explode with colour in early spring and autumn. It makes for an especially pleasant descent.
这条通往山顶的路线穿过风景秀丽的山谷，山谷里有引人注目的地质构造和树木，在早春和秋季绽放出色彩。它使下降变得特别愉快。

Near the South Gate to Heaven, take Peach Blossom Park cable car (桃花源索道, Táohuā Yuán suǒdào; %0853 833 0763; one way ¥100; h6.30am-5.30pm) down to Peach Blossom Valley. From the cable car drop-off it is another 9km on foot or by shuttle bus (one way ¥30; departs when full 6am to 6pm and midnight to 2am) to reach the park exit and bus 16 back into town.
在天堂南门附近，乘坐桃花源索道（桃花源索道 ，Táohuā Yuán suǒdào; % 0853 833 0763;单程 100 日元; h 早上 6.30 至下午 5.30） 前往桃花谷。从缆车下车站步行或乘坐穿梭巴士（单程 30 日元，早上 6 点至下午 6 点和午夜至凌晨 2 点满员时出发）再行驶 9 公里即可到达公园出口，然后乘坐 16 路公交车返回城镇。

zFestivals & Events
z 节日和活动

International Mount Tai Climbing FestivalSPORTS
国际泰山登山节 SPORTS

(泰山国际登山节, Tàishān Guójì Dēngshān Jié; hSep)

Trail runners and stair steppers converge to race up the Central Route for this festival every September.
每年 9 月，越野跑者和踏楼梯者都会聚集在中央路线上参加这个节日。

4Sleeping & Eating
4 睡眠和饮食

Sleeping on the mountain is atmospheric for sure, and essential if you want to view the sunrise, but it is more expensive and rooms are simpler than in Tai’an. Rates can triple during national holidays, but during slack periods you can bargain for discounts. Outside national holidays, there’s generally no need to book.
睡在山上当然很有气氛，如果你想看日出，这是必不可少的，但它比泰安更贵，房间也更简单。在国定假日期间，价格可能会增加三倍，但在闲暇期间，您可以讨价还价以获得折扣。在国定假日之外，一般无需预订。

Those on a tight budget can join the legions of Chinese students who sleep under the stars at the top of the mountain. At the summit, you can rent thick, full-length winter coats (¥20) to wrap yourself in, as well as simple camping mats (¥10). If it’s raining (or freezing) some restaurants at the summit will let you sleep on their floors for ¥10 or ¥20.
那些预算紧张的人可以加入成群结队的中国学生，他们睡在山顶的星空下。在山顶，您可以租用厚厚的长款冬衣（20 日元）来包裹自己，也可以租用简单的露营垫（10 日元）。如果下雨（或结冰），山顶的一些餐馆会让您睡在地板上，价格为 10 日元或 20 日元。

The Central Route is dotted with stalls and restaurants, with clusters at the cable cars, but there’s nowhere to buy food on the other routes, so come prepared. Prices rise as you do; expect to pay double the usual at the summit. Hawkers line the path to the summit (on the Central Route only), selling fruit, drinks and snacks that similarly increase in price with altitude. Alternatively, stock up in town before you climb.
中央路线上遍布摊位和餐馆，缆车上蜂拥而至，但其他路线上没有地方可以买食物，所以要做好准备。价格随着你的上涨而上涨;预计在峰会上支付的费用是平时的两倍。小贩在通往山顶的路上（仅限中央路线），出售水果、饮料和小吃，价格同样随着海拔的升高而上涨。或者，在攀登之前在城里囤货。

Cloud Nest HotelHOTEL¥¥
云巢酒店¥¥

(map Google map; 云巢宾馆, Yúncháo Bīnguǎn; %0538 806 6666; r ¥400-600, with shared bathroom ¥200; aW)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 云巢宾馆 ，Yúncháo Bīnguǎn; % 0538 806 6666;R 400-600 日元，共用浴室 200 日元; a W ）

Sadly the rooms aren’t as grand as the attractive courtyard entrance suggests, and the shared bathrooms don’t have showers, but the rooms with private bathrooms are decent enough, albeit rather small. Some English spoken. Close to the Peach Blossom Park cable car.
遗憾的是，房间并不像迷人的庭院入口所暗示的那么宏伟，共用浴室没有淋浴，但带私人浴室的房间已经足够体面了，尽管相当小。会说一些英语。靠近桃花公园缆车。

Xiānjū BīnguǎnHOTEL¥¥
Xiānjū BīnguǎnHOTEL¥¥

(map Google map; 仙居宾馆; %0538 652 2888; 5 Tian Jie, 天街5号; r ¥300-500; aW)

Up the steps slightly and to your left as you begin walking up to Tian Jie, this deceptively large hotel has en suite rooms that are small but comfortable enough, and a buffet restaurant. The older rooms at the back are cheapest and the best value.
当您开始走到天街时，稍微往上走，在左边，这家看似大的酒店设有带连接浴室的客房，虽然虽小但足够舒适，还有一家自助餐厅。后面的旧房间最便宜，最超值。

Shenqi HotelHOTEL¥¥¥
沈七酒店酒店 ¥¥¥

(map Google map; 神憩宾馆, Shénqì Bīnguǎn; %0538 822 3866; 18 Tian Jie, 天街18号; r ¥600-900, with mountain views from ¥1800; aW)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 神憩宾馆 ， Shénqì Bīnguǎn; % 0538 822 3866; 天街 18 号， 天街 18 号 ; r ¥600-900，山景¥1800 起; a W ）

This old-timer is the only hotel on the actual summit, with prices reflecting that. The priciest mountain-view standard rooms are very pleasant and are pretty much the pick of the mountain crop. The restaurant does a lunchtime buffet (¥88 per head) and an evening menu (dishes ¥40 to ¥60).
这家老前辈酒店是实际山顶上唯一的酒店，价格反映了这一点。最昂贵的山景标准间非常宜人，几乎是山区作物的选择。餐厅提供自助午餐（每人 88 日元）和晚间菜单（菜肴 40 至 60 日元）。

8Getting There & Away
8 到达那里和离开

Local buses (¥2) connect Tai Shan Train Station with access points to the mountain, mostly from 6.30am to 7.30pm during peak season and to 5.30pm otherwise. Some buses, such as K3, run until 11pm in peak season.
当地巴士（2 日元）将大山火车站与通往山上的入口连接起来，旺季期间主要为早上 6：30 至晚上 7：30，其他时间为下午 5：30。一些巴士，例如 K3，在旺季运行至晚上 11 点。

Note, the bus stop closest to the main entrance of the mountain’s Central Route is Hongmen Bus Stop (红门车站, Hóngmén chēzhàn; Hongmen Lu, 红门路). The bus stop closest to the Western Route entrance is Tianwai Village Bus Stop (天外村车站, Tiānwài Cūn chēzhàn).
请注意，距离山中线正门最近的公交站是红门车站 （ 红门车站 ，Hóngmén chēzhàn;红门路， 红门路 ）。 距离西线入口最近的公交站是天外村车站 。

Bus K3 Links Central Route’s Hongmen entrance with the Western Route’s Tianwai Village entrance.
K3 巴士连接中线鸿门口和西线天外村口。

Buses 4, 6 and 39 Link Tai Shan train station with Dai Temple.
4、6、39 路公交车连接大山火车站和大寺。

Bus 6 Links Tai’an Bus Station with Dai Temple, via Tai Shan Train Station.
6 路公交车通过大山火车站连接泰安汽车站和戴寺。

Bus 16 Connects to Peach Blossom Valley.
16 路公交车连接桃花谷。

Bus 19 Runs from Tianwai Village to the Tianzhu Peak trailhead via the main Hongmen entrance.
19 路公交车从天外村经鸿门主入口到达天竺峰登山口。

Bus 68 Runs from Tai Shan Train Station to Tai’an Train Station (known as Gāotiě Tài’ān Zhàn, 高铁泰安站).
68 路公交车从泰山火车站到泰安火车站（称为 Gāotiě Tài'ān Zhàn， 高铁泰安站 ）。

Taxis cost ¥7 for the first 3km and ¥1.50 (slightly more at night) per kilometre thereafter. It costs ¥12 from the Tai Shan Train Station or ¥26 from the Tai’an Train Station to the Central Route trailhead (红门, Hóng mén – Red Gate).
出租车前 3 公里 7 日元，之后每公里 1.50 日元（夜间略高）。从太山火车站出发，费用为 12 日元，从泰安火车站到中线登山口（ 红门 ，Hóng mén – 红门）的费用为 26 日元。

8Getting Around
8 四处走走

Frequent shuttle buses (¥30) run up and down the mountain all day between Tianwai Village and Midway Gate to Heaven. Cable cars reach the summit area from Midway Gate to Heaven, Peach Blossom Park and Rear Rocky Recess.
频繁的班车（¥30）全天往返于天外村和中途天门之间。 缆车从中途门到达天堂、桃花公园和后岩凹处到达山顶区域。

Qufu 曲阜
Qufu 曲阜

%0537 / Pop 60,000
% 0537 / 人口 60,000

The home town of the great sage Confucius and his descendants, the Kong clan, Qufu (Qūfù) is a testament to the importance of Confucian thought in imperial China and to this day. The town is one of Shandong’s top sights, and is a mandatory stop for anyone keen to see how revered the social philosopher remains.
曲阜（曲阜）是大圣孔子及其后代孔氏的故乡，证明了儒家思想在中国帝国和今天的重要性。该镇是山东的顶级景点之一，对于任何渴望了解这位社会哲学家仍然受到尊敬的人来说，这里是必经之地。

Viewing the main sights in and around the city walls of ancient Qufu, a Unesco World Heritage Site, will take a full day.
参观被联合国教科文组织列为世界遗产的古曲阜城墙内外的主要景点需要一整天的时间。

1Sights
1 景点

The principal sights – Confucius Temple, Confucius Mansion and Confucius Forest – are known collectively as ‘Sān Kǒng’ (三孔, ‘Three Kongs’). The main ticket office (孔庙售票处, Kǒng Miào shòupiàochù) is on Shendao Lu just outside the Confucius Temple’s entrance. You can buy admission to the individual sights, but the combination ticket (¥140 per person) grants access to all Three Kongs.
主要景点——孔庙、孔府和孔子林——统称为“ 三孔”（三孔 ，“三孔”）。主要售票处 （ 孔庙售票处 Kǒng Miào shòupiàochù） 位于神道路，就在孔庙入口外。您可以购买个别景点的门票，但组合票 （每人 140 日元）可以进入所有三金刚。

From November to March, admission to individual sights is ¥10 cheaper (the combined ticket stays the same) and sights close about a half hour earlier.
从 11 月到 3 月，个别景点的门票便宜 10 日元（组合门票保持不变），景点提前约半小时关闭。

Confucius TempleCONFUCIAN TEMPLE
孔庙 CONFUCIAN TEMPLE

(map Google map; 孔庙, Kǒng Miào; Nanmadao Xijie, 南马道西街; incl in combination ticket, or ¥90; h8am-5.10pm)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 孔庙 ，Kǒng Miào;南马道西街南马道西街 ;含组合票，或¥90; h 上午 8 点至下午 5 点 10 分）

Like shrines to Confucius throughout China and Asia, this is more museum than altar. The heart of the complex is the huge yellow-eaved Dacheng Hall (大成殿, Dàchéng Diàn), which in its present form dates from 1724. Craftspeople carved the 10 dragon-coiled columns so expertly that they were covered with red silk when Emperor Qianlong visited, lest he feel that the Forbidden City’s Hall of Supreme Harmony paled in comparison. Inside is a huge statue of Confucius resplendent on a throne.
就像中国和亚洲的孔子圣地一样，这与其说是祭坛，不如说是博物馆。该建筑群的中心是巨大的黄檐大成殿 （ 大成殿 ，Dàchéng Diàn），其现状可追溯至 1724 年。工匠们将这十根龙蟠柱雕刻得非常熟练，以至于乾隆皇帝来访时都用红绸覆盖，唯恐他觉得紫禁城的太和殿相比之下显得苍白无力。里面有一尊巨大的孔子雕像，金碧辉煌地坐在宝座上。

Above him are the characters 萬世師表 (wànshì shībiǎo), meaning ‘model teacher for all ages’.
在他上方是万世师表 （wànshì shībiǎo） 字，意思是“老少皆宜的模范教师”。

The temple has nine courtyards arranged on a central axis. China’s largest imperial building complex after the Forbidden City began as Confucius’ three-room house, but after his death in 478 BC the Duke of the Lu (鲁, Lǔ) state consecrated his simple abode as a temple. Everything in it, including his clothing, books, musical instruments and a carriage, was perfectly preserved. The house was rebuilt for the first time in AD 153, kicking off a series of expansions and renovations in subsequent centuries. By 1012 it had four courtyards and over 300 rooms. An imperialpalace-style wall was added. After a fire in 1499, it was rebuilt to its present scale.
寺庙有九个院落，沿着中轴线排列。中国继紫禁城之后最大的皇家建筑群，最初是孔子的三居室住宅，但在公元前 478 年孔子去世后，鲁国将他的简陋住所奉献为寺庙。 里面的一切，包括他的衣服、书籍、乐器和马车，都保存完好。这座房子于公元 153 年首次重建，在随后的几个世纪中开启了一系列扩建和翻修。到 1012 年，它拥有四个庭院和 300 多个房间。增加了皇宫风格的城墙。1499 年发生火灾后，它被重建到现在的规模。

Over 1000 stelae documenting imperial gifts and sacrifices from the Han dynasty onwards, as well as treasured examples of calligraphy and stone reliefs, are preserved on the grounds. Look for a bìxì bearing the Cheng Hua stele (成化碑, Chénghuà bēi), dedicated by the Ming emperor in 1468, which praises Confucius in a particularly bold, formal hand. The characters are so perfect that copies were used to teach penmanship. The Shengji Hall (圣迹殿, Shèngjī Diàn) houses 120 famed Tang-dynasty paintings depicting Confucius’ life immortalised as carvings.
院内保存着 1000 多块记录汉代以来皇家礼物和祭祀的石碑，以及珍贵的书法和石浮雕。寻找一块带有成华碑 （ 成化碑 ，Chénghuà bēi）的毕溪 ，明朝皇帝于 1468 年奉献，以特别大胆、正式的手表赞美孔子。这些字符非常完美，以至于复制品被用来教授书法。圣迹殿（圣迹殿 ，Shèngjī Diàn）收藏了 120 幅著名的唐代绘画，描绘了孔子的一生，这些绘画被雕刻成永垂不朽的作品。

Halfway through the complex rises the triple-eaved Great Pavilion of the Constellation of Scholars (奎文阁, Kuíwén Gé), an imposing Song-dynasty wooden structure. A series of gates and colossal, twin-eaved stele pavilions lead to the Apricot Altar (杏坛, Xìng Tán), which marks the spot where Confucius taught his students under an apricot tree.
建筑群的一半耸立着三檐的书生星座大阁 （ 奎文阁 ，Kuíwén Gé），这是一座雄伟的宋代木结构建筑。一系列的大门和巨大的双檐石碑亭通向杏坛（杏坛 ，Xìng Tán）， 这是孔子在杏树下教导学生的地方。

South of Chongsheng Hall (崇圣祠, Chóngshèng Cí), which was once the site of the original family temple, the Lu Wall (鲁壁, Lǔ Bì) stands where Confucius’ ninth-generation descendant hid Confucius’ writings in the walls of his house during Emperor Qin Shi Huang’s book-burning campaign around 213 BC. The texts were uncovered during an attempt to raze the grounds in 154 BC, spurring new schools of Confucian scholarship and long debates over what Confucius really said.
在曾经是原家庙所在地崇圣殿 （ 崇圣祠 ，Chóngshèng Cí）以南，鲁壁（鲁壁 ，Lǔ Bì ）矗立在公元前 213 年左右秦始皇焚书运动期间，孔子的九代后裔将孔子的著作藏在他家的墙壁上。这些文本是在公元前 154 年试图夷平土地时发现的，刺激了新的儒家学术流派和关于孔子真正说的话的长期争论。

Confucius MansionMUSEUM
孔府博物馆

(map Google map; 孔府, Kǒng Fǔ; Queli Jie, 阙里街; incl in combination ticket, or ¥60; h8.10am-5pm)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 孔府 ，Kǒng Fǔ;阙里街， 阙里街 ;含组合票，或¥60; h 上午 8.10 至下午 5 点）

Next to Confucius Temple is this maze of living quarters, halls, studies and further studies. The mansion buildings were moved from the temple grounds to the present site in 1377 and vastly expanded into 560 rooms in 1503. More remodelling followed, including reconstruction following a devastating fire in 1885. The mansion was for centuries the most sumptuous private residence in China, thanks to imperial sponsorship and the Kong clan’s rule, which included powers of taxation and execution, over Qufu as an autonomous estate.
夫子庙旁边是这个迷宫般的生活区、大厅、书房和深造。豪宅建筑于 1377 年从寺庙场地迁至现址，并于 1503 年大幅扩建为 560 个房间。随后进行了更多的改造，包括 1885 年一场毁灭性火灾后的重建。几个世纪以来，这座宅邸一直是中国最豪华的私人住宅，这要归功于皇室的赞助和孔氏对曲阜自治庄园的统治，其中包括征税和执行权。

The clan indulged in 180-course meals, and kept servants and consorts. Male heirs successively held the title of Duke Yan Sheng from the Song dynasty until 1935.
该氏族沉迷于180道菜的餐点，并保留了仆人和配偶。男性继承人从宋代到1935年，先后担任燕圣公爵。

Confucius Mansion is built on an ‘interrupted’ north–south axis with administrative offices (taxes, edicts, rites, registration and examination halls) at the entrance (south) and private quarters at the back (north). The Ceremonial Gate (重光门, Chóngguāng Mén) was opened only when emperors dropped in. The central path passes a series of halls, including the Great Hall (大堂, Dà Táng) and Nèizhái Gate (内宅门, Nèizhái Mén), which separated the private and public parts of the residence and was guarded at all times.
孔子府建在“中断”的南北轴线上，入口（南）设有行政办公室（税收、诏令、礼仪、注册和考场），后（北）设有私人宿舍。礼门 （ 重光门 ，Chóngguāng Mén）只有在皇帝进来时才打开。中央小路经过一系列大厅，包括大堂 （Dà Táng）和内宅门 （ 内宅门 ，Nèizhái Mén），它们将住宅的私人和公共部分分开，并时刻有人看守。

The large ‘shòu’ character (壽, longevity) presented in traditional Chinese script within the single-eaved Upper Front Chamber (前上房, Qián Shàng Fáng) north of Nèizhái Gate was a gift from Qing Empress Cixi. The Duke lived in the two-storey Front Chamber (前堂楼, Qián Táng Lóu).
内翟门北单檐上前房内以繁体字呈现的大“ 寿” 字（ 寿 ，寿）是清太后慈禧的礼物。 公爵住在两层楼的前堂楼（前堂楼 ，Qián Táng Lóu）。

Just east of Nèizhái Gate is the Tower of Refuge (奎楼, Kuí Lóu), not open to visitors, where the Kong clan could gather if the peasants turned nasty. It has an iron-lined ceiling on the ground floor and a staircase that could be yanked up.
内翟门的东边是避难塔 （ 奎楼 ，Kuí Lóu），不对游客开放，如果农民变得讨厌，孔氏家族可以聚集在那里。它的一楼有一个铁衬天花板，还有一个可以拉上去的楼梯。

There’s a pleasant fruit-tree garden at the north end of the complex; you can then leave via the north gate (exit only).
建筑群的北端有一个宜人的果树花园;然后您可以从北门（仅限出口）离开。

Confucius ForestCEMETERY
孔子林墓地

(孔林, Kǒng Lín; Lindao Lu, 林道路; incl in combination ticket, or ¥40; h8am-5.20pm)
（ 孔林 ，Kǒng Lín;林道路， 林道路 ;含组合票，或¥40; h 上午 8 点至下午 5 点 20 分）

About 1km north of the walled town on Lindao Lu is the peaceful Confucius Forest, a cemetery of pine and cypress covering 200 hectares and bounded by a 10km-long wall, which was built on top of the foundations of the Zhou-dynasty wall that encircled the ancient capital city of the Lu State. Confucius and more than 100,000 of his descendants have been buried here for the past 2000 years, a tradition still ongoing.
临道路寨城以北约1公里处是宁静的孔子林，这是一座占地200公顷的松柏陵园，以10公里长的城墙为界，建在环绕鲁国古都的周代城墙的地基之上。在过去的 2000 年里，孔子和他的 100,000 多名后代一直埋葬在这里，这一传统仍在延续。

The great sage’s tomb is a simple grass mound enclosed by a low wall and faced with a Ming-dynasty stele. Pairs of stone guardians stand at the ready. His son and grandson are buried nearby, and scattered through the forest are dozens of temples and pavilions.
大圣墓是一个简单的草丘，用矮墙围起来，面对着一块明代的石碑。成对的石头守护者随时待命。他的儿子和孙子就葬在附近，森林中散落着数十座寺庙和亭台楼阁。

When Confucius died in 479 BC, he was buried on the bank of the Si River beneath a simple marker. In the Western Han dynasty, Emperor Wudi deemed Confucianism the only worthy school of thought, and the Tomb of Confucius (孔子墓, Kǒngzǐ Mù) became a place of pilgrimage.
孔子于公元前 479 年去世时，他被埋葬在泗河岸边的一个简单标记下。在西汉，武帝认为儒家思想是唯一有价值的学派，孔子墓 （ 孔子墓 ，Kǒngzǐ Mù）成为朝圣地。

A slow walk through the parklike cemetery can take a couple of hours, though Confucius’ tomb is just a 10-minute walk from the entrance (turn left after the second gateway, called ‘Supreme Sage Cemetery Gateway’).
慢慢地穿过公园般的墓地可能需要几个小时，但孔子陵距离入口仅 10 分钟步行路程（在第二个大门后左转，称为“太圣墓园门户”）。

Electric sightseeing carts (¥20) are on hand to take passengers on a loop of the forest before dropping them back at Confucius’ tomb, but you get much more freedom if you explore on foot.
电动观光车（20 日元）可以带乘客在森林中绕一圈，然后将他们送回孔子陵，但如果您步行探索，您将获得更多自由。

The forest is a 15-minute walk from the old town, or take bus 1 (¥1) from Gulou Beijie, or a pedicab (¥10).
从老城区步行 15 分钟即可到达森林，或从鼓楼北街乘坐 1 路公交车（1 日元）或三轮车（10 日元）。

Confucius CavePARK
孔子洞公园

(夫子洞, Fūzǐ Dòng; Ni Shan, 尼山; ¥50; h8.10am-5pm)
（ 夫子洞 ，Fūzǐ Dòng;倪山， 尼山 ; ¥50; h 上午 8.10 至下午 5 点）

About 30km southeast of Qufu, this cave on Ni Mountain (尼山, Ní Shān) is where, according to legend, a frighteningly ugly Confucius was born, abandoned and cared for by a tiger and an eagle, before his mother realised he was sent from heaven and decided to care for him. The gravitas is a bit hokey, but the sight offers a chance for some fresh air. Bus 30 (¥1) goes to Ni Shan from Qufu Bus Station. A taxi is about ¥40.
在曲阜东南约 30 公里处，尼山（Ní Shān）上的这个洞穴，相传是一位丑陋得可怕的孔子出生的地方，被老虎和鹰遗弃并照顾，直到他的母亲意识到他是从天堂派来的，并决定照顾他。庄严有点滑稽，但这个景象提供了呼吸新鲜空气的机会。30 路公交车（¥1）从曲阜汽车站开往倪山。出租车大约 40 日元。

Drum TowerTOWER
鼓楼 TOWER

(map Google map; 鼓楼, Gǔ Lóu; Gulou Beijie, 鼓楼北街)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 鼓楼 ，Gǔ Lóu;鼓楼北街 ）

Qufu’s Drum Tower stands at the centre of the old walled town at the point where Gulou Dajie – named after the Bell Tower – divides into its northern and southern sections.
曲阜鼓楼矗立在古城的中心，位于鼓楼大街（以钟楼命名）分为北部和南部的地方。

Bell TowerTOWER
钟楼 TOWER

(map Google map; 钟楼, Zhōnglóu; Zhonglou Jie, 钟楼街)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 钟楼 ，Zhōnglóu; 钟楼街

The small and charming brick bell tower stands astride the road at the centre of town, to the east of the Confucius Temple.
小而迷人的砖砌钟楼矗立在市中心的道路上，位于孔庙以东。

Yan TempleCONFUCIAN TEMPLE
燕庙 CONFUCIAN TEMPLE

(map Google map; 颜庙, Yán Miào; Yanmiao Jie, 颜庙街; ¥50; h8.10am-4.40pm; g1, 3)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 颜庙 ，Yán Miào; 颜庙街，颜庙街 ; ¥50; h 上午 8.10 至下午 4.40; g 1、3）

This tranquil temple northeast of Confucius Mansion is dedicated to Confucius’ beloved disciple Yan Hui, whose death at age 32 caused the understated Confucius ‘excessive grief’. The main structure, Fusheng Hall (复圣殿, Fùshèng Diàn), has a magnificent ceiling decorated with a dragon head motif. Outside a bìxì (mythical tortoiselike dragon) carries a stele that posthumously granted Yan the title of Duke of Yanguo (in both Han and Mongol script) in AD 1331.
这座位于孔子府东北部的宁静寺庙供奉着孔子的爱徒严晖，他在 32 岁时去世，这让低调的孔子“过度悲伤”。主体结构复圣殿 （ 复圣殿 ，Fùshèng Diàn）拥有宏伟的天花板，装饰有龙头图案。外面有一块比西 （神话中的龟状龙）携带着一块石碑，该石碑于公元 1331 年追授燕国公爵（汉文和蒙古文）。

LOCAL KNOWLEDGE
当地知识

CONFUCIUS SAYS: ‘FREE TICKETS!’
孔子说：“免费门票！

As part of a drive to improve worldwide understanding of Confucian culture, foreign tourists are given a free ticket to the ‘Three Kongs’ (Confucius Temple, Confucius Mansion and Confucius Forest) if they can recite five Confucian quotations from the famous book of his teachings, The Analects. So, if you’re willing to put in the effort, you could save yourself ¥140.
作为提高世界对儒家文化了解的一部分，外国游客如果能背诵孔子的著名著作 《论语》 中的五句儒家语录，就可以免费获得一张“三孔”（孔庙、孔府和孔子森林）的门票。所以，如果你愿意付出努力，你可以为自己节省 140 日元。

Here are five relatively short quotes you could use:
您可以使用以下五个相对简短的引言：

A yǒu jiào wú lèi (有教无类; education is for all)
A 有教无类

A guò yóu bù jí (过犹不及; going too far is as bad as falling short)
A 过犹不及

A dào bùtóng, bù xiāng wéi móu (道不同, 不相为谋; to go separate ways)
A dào bùtóng， bù xiāng wéi móu （ 道不同 ， 不相为谋 ;

A jūnzǐ bù qì (君子不器; the noble are not mere utensils)
A 君子不器 ，贵人不仅仅是器皿

A dé bù gū, bì yǒu lín (德不孤, 必有邻; virtue brings you neighbours, not loneliness)
A 德不孤 ， 必有邻 ，美德给你带来邻居，而不是孤独）

If you want to try, go to the Confucius Temple ticket office and say: ‘wǒ yào bèi lún yǔ’ (我要背论语; ‘I’d like to recite from The Analects’).
如果你想尝试一下，可以去孔庙售票处说：“wǒ yào bèi lún yǔ”（ 我要背论语 ;“我想背诵《论语》”）。

zFestivals & Events
z 节日和活动

Every morning at 8am, following a recitation, a costumed procession raucously walks up Shendao Lu from Jingxian Lu to the main gate to officially open the city.
每天早上8点，在朗诵之后，盛装游行队伍从景仙路喧闹地沿着神道路走到正门，正式开城。

Confucius Temple holds two major festivals a year: Tomb Sweeping Day (usually 5 April; celebrations may last all weekend) and the Sage’s Birthday (28 September), both involving elaborate, costumed ceremonies. The city also comes alive with craftspeople, healers, acrobats and peddlers during annual fairs in the spring and autumn.
孔庙每年举行两个主要节日：清明节 （通常为 4 月 5 日，庆祝活动可能持续整个周末）和圣人诞辰 （9 月 28 日），这两个节日都涉及精心设计的盛装仪式。在春季和秋季的年度集市期间，这座城市也充满了工匠、治疗师、杂技演员和小贩。

4 睡眠

oQufu International Youth HostelHOSTEL¥
o 曲阜国际青年旅舍 HOSTEL¥

This welcoming hostel at the north end of Gulou Beijie has particularly clean rooms and very comfortable beds. The twin rooms are better value than the doubles as they are much larger, but the same price. The dorms are quite cramped, but some have their own bathrooms. Helpful staff speak some English, and the attached cafe-bar-restaurant is a nice hangout.
这家温馨的旅馆位于鼓楼北街的北端，拥有特别干净的房间和非常舒适的床。双床间比双人间更超值，因为它们要大得多，但价格相同。宿舍很狭窄，但有些宿舍有自己的浴室。乐于助人的工作人员会说一些英语，附属的咖啡厅-酒吧-餐厅是一个不错的聚会场所。

This new hotel is good value, with clean, bright, modern rooms going for just over ¥100 after discounts. The linen is fresh, and the beds are large and comfortably firm. No English spoken, though.
这家新酒店物超所值，干净、明亮、现代的客房打折后只需 100 多日元。床单很新鲜，床很大，很结实。不过，不会说英语。

This elegant branch of the dependable Jinjiang Inn brood has a calming lobby area leading to smart rooms, some of which look out over the small, central, bamboo courtyard.
这家优雅的锦江客栈小伙子店设有一个平静的大堂区，通向智能客房，其中一些客房俯瞰着中央的小竹庭院。

紫悦万居酒店¥¥

Smack-bang in the middle of the old town, this attractive, traditional-style but brand-new hotel has large, bright, modern rooms with comfy beds and friendly staff.
这家迷人的传统风格但全新的酒店位于老城区中心，拥有宽敞、明亮、现代的客房，配有舒适的床铺和友好的工作人员。

Queli HotelHOTEL¥¥
Queli HotelHOTEL¥¥

This 30-year-old traditional-style hotel is the fanciest place to stay inside the old-town walls. Staff are courteous and friendly and some speak English, while rooms are stylish, albeit with very small bathrooms. 这家拥有 30 年历史的传统风格酒店是老城区城墙内最豪华的住宿地点。工作人员彬彬有礼，友好，有些会说英语，而房间很时尚，尽管浴室很小。部分一楼客房设有私人庭院，但夏季可能会发霉;一楼的房间比较清新。也有一些寺庙景观房，但价格稍高一些。

5Eating & Drinking
5 饮食

The local speciality is Confucius Cuisine (孔家菜, kǒng jiā cài – literally, Kong-family cuisine), which, despite its name, is the furthest thing from home cooking because it developed as a result of all the imperial-style banquets the family threw. Few restaurants serving Confucius Cuisine have English menus. One that does is the restaurant at Queli Hotel.
当地的特产是孔家菜（孔家菜 ，kǒng jiā cài – 字面意思是孔家菜），尽管它的名字，但它是与家常菜最相去甚远的东西，因为它是由于家庭举办的所有皇家式宴会而发展起来的。很少有供应孔子菜的餐厅有英文菜单。其中之一是 Queli Hotel 的餐厅。

There are a few low-key bars dotted around the streets of the walled town, including a couple intriguingly built into the southern wall (both left and right of the South Gate).
城墙小镇的街道上散布着几家低调的酒吧，其中有几家有趣的酒吧建在南墙上（南门的左侧和右侧）。

Zi Yue Man Ju RestaurantCHINESE¥¥
紫悦万居餐厅中式¥¥

(map Google map; 子曰漫居酒店餐厅, Zǐyuē Mànjū Jiǔdiàn Cāntīng; 8 Gulou Beijie, 鼓楼北街8号; most dishes ¥20-60; h9am-9pm)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 子曰漫居酒店餐厅 ， Zǐyuē Mànjū Jiǔdiàn Cāntīng; 8 Gulou Beijie， 鼓楼北街 8 号 ;大部分菜品¥20-60; h 上午 9 点至晚上 9 点）

This clean, modern restaurant attached to Zi Yue Man Ju Hotel does ordinary Chinese fried dishes and noodles, as well as Confucius Cuisine. Staff are welcoming, but there’s no English here. Confucius Cuisine dishes to look for include yīpǐn dòufu (一品豆腐, stuffed tofu, ¥48) and shénxiān yāzi (神仙鸭子, fragrant, crispy, steamed-duck soup, ¥88), aka ‘fairy duck’.
这家干净、现代的餐厅附属于紫月万居酒店，提供普通的中式炸物和面条，以及孔子菜。工作人员很热情，但这里没有英语。值得寻找的孔子菜肴包括 yīpǐn dòufu（ 一品豆腐 ，酿豆腐，¥48）和 shénxiān yāzi（ 神仙鸭子 ，香脆的蒸鸭汤，¥88），又名“仙女鸭”。

Late-night barbecue stallsSTREET FOOD¥
深夜烧烤摊 STREET FOOD¥

(map Google map; 烧烤夜市, Shāokǎo Yèshì; Yan’en Donglu, 延恩东路; skewers ¥1 to ¥2; h6pm-3am)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 烧烤夜市 ， Shāokǎo Yèshì;延恩东路， 延恩东路 ;串烧 ¥1 至 ¥2; h 下午 6 点至凌晨 3 点）

Street-side vendors are banned from Qufu these days, so the barbecue crew now set up their smoky grills just off the road in this large car park immediately northeast of the walled town’s north gate. Barbecue skewers are the order of the day (veggie/meat ¥1/2), and they’re all on display; just point and choose.
如今，衢阜禁止街边小贩进入，因此烧烤人员现在在围墙小镇北门东北部的这个大型停车场的路边设置了烟熏烤架。烧烤串是当天的订单（蔬菜/肉类 1/2 日元），它们都在陈列中;只需指向并选择。

Zhèngzōng Tiānjīn XiǎolóngbāoDUMPLINGS¥
Zhèngzōng Tiānjīn Xiǎolóngbāo 饺子 ¥

（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 正宗天津小笼包 ;鼓楼南街， 鼓楼南街 ;每篮¥7; h 早上 6 点至晚上 8 点）

Ideal for breakfast, the xiǎo lóng bāo (小笼包, steamed dumplings) at this tiny place come with various fillings including pork and onion (鲜肉, xiān ròu), pork and mushroom (香菇肉, xiānggū ròu), egg and chives (韭菜鸡蛋, jiǔcài jīdàn), and carrot and egg (胡萝卜鸡蛋, húluóbo jīdàn). A warming bowl of xiǎomǐ zhōu (小米粥, millet porridge) or dòu jiāng (豆浆, soy milk) make a perfect accompaniment.
这个小地方的 xiǎo lóng bāo（ 小笼包 ，蒸饺子）是早餐的理想选择，配有各种馅料，包括猪肉和洋葱（ 鲜肉 ，xiān ròu）、猪肉和蘑菇（ 香菇肉 ，xiānggū ròu）、鸡蛋和韭菜（ 韭菜鸡蛋 ，jiǔcài jīdàn）和胡萝卜鸡蛋（胡萝卜鸡蛋，húluóbo jīdàn）。一碗温暖的小米粥（ 小米粥，小米粥）或豆浆（豆浆 ，豆浆）是完美的搭配。

曲阜夜市 MARKET¥

(曲阜夜市, Qūfù Yèshì; Sports Park on Hongdao Lu, 弘道路体育公园; snacks/dishes from ¥5/10; haround 6pm-11pm)

The busy, aromatic night market is a short walk south of the southeast corner of the old-town wall, and cooks up lamb kebabs, noodles, húntún (wontons), tofu and many other dishes and street snacks. Bus 1 goes here from Gulou Beijie; get off at tǐyù gōngyuán (体育公园) stop.
繁忙、芳香的夜市位于老城墙东南角以南不远的步行路程处，烹制羊肉串、面条、 浑屯 （馄饨）、豆腐和许多其他菜肴和街头小吃。1 路公交车从鼓楼北街到这里;在 Tǐyù Gōngyuán （ 体育公园 ） 站下车。

Qing Lu Tea RestaurantINTERNATIONAL¥¥
青路茶餐厅国际¥¥

One of the few places in town with an English menu, this friendly cafe-bar-restaurant attached to the town’s excellent youth hostel does a mix of western (pizza, pasta, salads, sandwiches) and Chinese (noodles, dumplings, rice meals) food. Also good for a morning coffee, or an evening beer over a game of pool.
