CONFUCIUS: THE FIRST TEACHER
孔子：第一位老师

An idealist born into a world of violent upheaval, Confucius (551–479 BC) spent his life trying to stabilise society according to traditional ideals. By his own measure he failed, but over time he became one of the most influential thinkers the world has known. Confucius’ ideals remain at the core of values in East Asia today and still exercise massive power over Chinese thinking.
孔子（公元前 551-479 年）是一位出生在剧烈动荡的世界的理想主义者，他一生都在努力根据传统理想稳定社会。以他自己的标准来看，他失败了，但随着时间的推移，他成为世界上最有影响力的思想家之一。孔子的理想仍然是当今东亚价值观的核心，并且仍然对中国思想施加着巨大的影响。

Confucius was born Kong Qiu (孔丘), earning the honorific Kongfuzi (孔夫子), literally ‘Master Kong’, after becoming a teacher. His family was poor but of noble rank, and eventually he became an official in his home state of Lǔ (鲁). At the age of 50 he put a plan into action to reform government that included routing corruption. This resulted in his exile, and he spent 13 years travelling from state to state, hoping to find a ruler who would put his ideas into practice. Eventually he returned to his home town of Qufu and spent the remainder of his life expounding the wisdom of the Six Classics (The Book of Changes, Songs, Rites, History, Music and the Spring and Autumn Annals). Taking on students from varied backgrounds, he believed that everyone, not just aristocracy, had a right to knowledge. This ideal became one of his greatest legacies.
孔子原名孔丘 ，成为教师后获得了尊称孔夫子 ，字面意思是“孔夫子”。他的家庭贫穷但地位高贵，最终他成为家乡鲁国的官员。50 岁时，他将一项政府改革计划付诸行动，其中包括消除腐败。这导致他被流放，他花了 13 年的时间从一个州到另一个州，希望找到一位能够将他的想法付诸实践的统治者。最终，他回到了家乡曲阜，用余生阐述了六经（《 易》、《 宗》、《礼 》、《 史 》、《 乐 》和《 春秋 》）的智慧。他接受来自不同背景的学生，相信每个人都有知识权，而不仅仅是贵族。这个理想成为他最伟大的遗产之一。

Confucius’ teachings were compiled by his disciples in The Analects (论语, Lúnyǔ), a collection of 497 aphorisms. Though he claimed to be merely transmitting the ideals of an ancient golden age, Confucius was in fact China’s first humanist philosopher, upholding morality (humaneness, righteousness and virtue) and self-cultivation as the basis for social order. ‘What you do not wish for yourself,’ he said, ‘do not do to others.’
孔子的教诲被他的弟子编纂在《 论语 》中， 该书收录了 497 条格言。孔子虽然声称只是在传递古代黄金时代的理想，但实际上孔子是中国第一位人文主义哲学家，他坚持道德（人、义、德）和修身养性作为社会秩序的基础。“你自己不愿的，”他说，“不要对别人做。

8Getting Around
8 四处走走

There are no direct buses from the airport to the old town of Qufu, so you will need to transfer to a bus or taxi at the bus station in Jining (济宁, Jǐníng), about 50km away. Flying into the provincial capital Ji’nan (济南, Jǐnán) is probably more convenient.
从机场到曲阜老城区没有直达巴士，因此您需要在约 50 公里外的济宁（济宁 ，Jǐníng）的汽车站换乘巴士或出租车。飞往省会济南（济南 ，Jǐnán）可能更方便。

Local buses cost ¥1 per trip.
当地巴士每趟收费 1 日元。

Bus K01 Connects Qufu Bus Station with the East Train Station, via Confucius Temple’s south gate.
K01 巴士通过孔庙南门连接曲阜汽车站和火车东站。

Bus K03 Connects Qufu Bus Station and Qufu Train Station, via Confucius Temple’s south gate.
客车 K03 通过孔庙南门连接曲阜汽车站和曲阜火车站。

Bus 10 Goes from Qufu Bus Station to the Drum Tower and People’s No 2 Hospital, via Confucius Temple’s south gate.
10 路公交车从曲阜汽车站经孔庙南门前往鼓楼和人民第二医院。

Bus 1 Goes from the Drum Tower north to Confucius Forest and south to the night market.
公交车 1 从鼓楼北到孔子林，南到夜市。

A taxi to the walled town is about ¥40 from East Train Station and about ¥20 from Qufu Bus Station.
从火车东站乘坐出租车约 40 日元，从曲阜汽车站乘坐出租车约 20 日元。

Ubiquitous pedicabs (¥5 to ¥10 within the walls; ¥10 to ¥20 outside the walls) are a pleasant way to get around, but be sure to negotiate the fare very clearly before your ride. Most places, however, can be walked to easily. If you care about animal welfare, give the horse-drawn carts a miss.
无处不在的三轮车（城墙内 5 至 10 日元，城墙外 10 至 20 日元）是一种愉快的出行方式，但请务必在乘车前非常清楚地协商票价。然而，大多数地方都可以轻松步行到达。如果您关心动物福利，请错过马车。

Zoucheng 邹城
邹城

%0537 / Pop 1.15 million
% 0537 / 人口 115 万

Twenty-three kilometres south of Qufu is Zoucheng (Zōuchéng), where the revered Confucian scholar Mencius (孟子, Mèngzǐ; c 372–289 BC) was born. Like Confucius, Mencius was raised by a single mother and grew up to travel the country trying to reform government. His belief that humanity is by nature good formed the core of all his teachings, including his call to overthrow self-serving rulers. Not surprisingly, his criticism made him unpopular with those in power, but a thousand years after his death Mencius’ work was elevated a step below Confucius’.
曲阜以南 23 公里处是邹城（邹城），受人尊敬的儒家孟子（ 孟子 ，孟子，约公元前 372-289 年）出生于此。和孔子一样，孟子由单亲母亲抚养长大，长大后周游全国，试图改革政府。他相信人类本质上是善良的，这构成了他所有教义的核心，包括他呼吁推翻自私的统治者。毫不奇怪，他的批评使他不受当权者的欢迎，但在他死后一千年，孟子的著作比孔子的著作低了一步。

Zoucheng today is a pretty quiet town, with fewer tourist hassles than Qufu. A combined ticket (summer/winter ¥40/30) get you access to both Mencius Temple and Mencius Family Mansion, which are next to each other. In winter, they both close at 4pm.
今天的邹城是一个相当安静的小镇，比曲阜少了游客的麻烦。使用夏季/冬季联票（40/30日元）可以进入相邻的孟子庙和孟子家宅邸。在冬季，它们都在下午 4 点关闭。

It’s fun to explore the myriad courtyards and gardens at Mencius Family Mansion (孟府, Mèng Fǔ; Miaoqian Lu, 庙前路; incl Mencius Temple ¥40; h8.20am-5pm), which among other things exhibits the family’s living quarters, including teacups and bedding left by Mencius’ 74th-generation descendant, who lived here into the 1940s.
在孟府探索无数的庭院和花园很有趣 孟府 ， Mèng Fǔ;Miaoqian Lu， 庙前路 ;含孟子庙 ¥40; h 上午 8 点 20 分至下午 5 点）， 其中展示了该家庭的居住区，包括孟子第 74 代后裔留下的茶杯和床上用品，他们一直住在这里直到 1940 年代。

A portrait of ancient China and tranquillity, the Mencius Temple (孟庙, Mèng Miào) originally dates from the Song dynasty; it bears the marks of past anti-Confucian mood swings, though restoration is always ongoing. With few visitors around, you can sit in the shade of ancient gnarled cypresses, absorbing the serene surroundings. The twin-roofed Hall of the Second Sage (亚圣殿, Yàshèng Diàn) looms in the centre of the grounds, a small shrine next to it dedicated to Mencius’ mother, the ‘model for all mothers’.
孟子庙 （ 孟庙 ，Mèng Miào） 是古代中国和宁静的写照，其历史可以追溯到宋代;它带有过去反儒家情绪波动的痕迹，尽管修复工作一直在进行中。周围游客很少，您可以坐在古老的多节柏树的树荫下，沉浸在宁静的环境中。双屋顶的亚圣殿（亚圣殿 ，Yàshèng Diàn）隐约出现在场地的中央，旁边有一座供奉孟子母亲的小神龛，孟子是“所有母亲的榜样”。

The Zoucheng Museum (邹城博物馆, Zōuchéng Bówùguǎn; 56 Shunhe Lu, 顺和路56号; h9am-11am & 2-4pm Tue-Sun) F on Shunhe Lu displays a collection of items relating to Zoucheng through history. Note the very long lunch break.
邹城博物馆 ，遵和路 56 号 h ， 周二至周日 9am-11am & 2-4pm） F 展示了与邹城历史相关的藏品。 请注意很长的午休时间。

There are few sleeping options here for foreigners, but this is an easy day trip from Qufu. There’s a handful of small restaurants selling noodles and the like on the walk between the museum and the two main sights. The rhythm of Zoucheng is Confucian in nature, so nightlife and drinking are done in rather low-key fashion.
外国人在这里的睡眠选择很少，但这是从曲阜出发的轻松一日游。在博物馆和两个主要景点之间的步行道上，有几家卖面条之类的小餐馆。邹城的节奏本质上是儒家的，所以夜生活和饮酒都是以相当低调的方式进行的。

Zoucheng is any easy bus ride from Qufu. Bus C609 (¥3, 40 minutes, 6.30am to 6.30pm) departs frequently from Qufu Bus Station. Get off at the museum bus stop (博物馆, Bówùguǎn), then walk ahead to the river (but don’t cross it). To your left is the museum (50m). To your right are the temple and mansion (200m).
邹城是从曲阜乘坐巴士的便捷路线。C609 路公交车（3 日元，40 分钟，早上 6：30 至下午 6：30）经常从曲阜汽车站出发。在博物馆巴士站（ 博物馆 ，Bówùguǎn）下车，然后向前走到河边（但不要过河）。左边是博物馆（50m）。右边是寺庙和豪宅（200m）。

A new sky train (轻轨, qīng guǐ) that will link Zoucheng to Qufu’s East Train Station was under construction at the time of research.
在研究时，连接邹城和曲阜东站的新轻轨（ 轻轨 ，qīng guǐ）正在建设中。

Qingdao
青岛

%0532 / Pop 5.9 million
% 0532 / 人口 590 万

Combining fresh sea air and dashing good looks, Qingdao (青岛, Qīngdǎo; sometimes spelled Tsingtao) – the name means ‘Green Island’ – is a rare Chinese city that has managed to preserve some of its past while angling a dazzling modern face to the future. Its blend of concession-era and modern architecture puts China’s standard white-tile and blue-glass developments to shame. The winding cobbled streets, historic German architecture and red-capped hillside villas are captivating and there’s much to enjoy in the city’s diverse food scene, headlined by the ubiquitous home-town beer Tsingtao. Meanwhile, the seaside aspect keeps the town cooler than the inland swelter zones during summer, and slightly warmer in winter.
青岛（ 青岛 ，Qīngdǎo，有时拼写为青岛）——这个名字的意思是“青岛”）——结合了新鲜的海洋空气和潇洒的美貌，是一座罕见的中国城市，它成功地保留了它的一些过去，同时将耀眼的现代面貌与未来相结合。它融合了租界时代和现代建筑，使中国标准的白砖和蓝玻璃开发项目相形见绌。蜿蜒的鹅卵石街道、历史悠久的德国建筑和红顶山坡别墅令人着迷，这座城市多样化的美食场景有很多值得享受的地方，其中以无处不在的家乡啤酒青岛为主角。同时，海滨使该镇在夏季比内陆闷热地区凉爽，在冬季略暖和。

History
历史

Before catching the acquisitive eye of Kaiser Wilhelm II, Qingdao was a harbour and fishing village known for producing delicious sea salt. Its excellent strategic location was not lost on the Ming dynasty, which built a defensive battery – nor on the Germans, who wrested it from them in 1897. China signed a 99-year concession, and it was during the next decade that the future Tsingtao Brewery was opened, electric lighting installed, missions and a university established, and the railway to Ji’nan built.
在引起德皇威廉二世的收购眼球之前，青岛是一个以生产美味海盐而闻名的港口和渔村。它优越的战略位置并没有被明朝所失去，明朝建造了一个防御炮台，也没有被德国人所失去，德国人于 1897 年从他们手中夺取了它。中国签署了一份为期 99 年的租界，正是在接下来的十年里，未来的青岛啤酒厂开业，安装了电灯，建立了传教所和一所大学，并修建了通往济南的铁路。

In 1914 Japan seized control with a bombing assault on the city. When the Treaty of Versailles strengthened Japan’s occupation in 1919, student demonstrations erupted in Beijing and spread across the country in what became known as the May 4th Movement. After a period of domestic control, the Japanese took over again in 1938 and held on until the end of WWII.
1914 年，日本通过对这座城市的轰炸袭击夺取了控制权。1919 年《凡尔赛条约》加强了日本的占领，学生示威活动在北京爆发，并蔓延到全国，后来被称为“五四运动”。经过一段时间的国内控制后，日本人于 1938 年再次接管并坚持到二战结束。

In peacetime Qingdao became one of China’s major ports and a flourishing centre of trade and manufacturing (home to both domestic and international brands). The port town hosted the sailing events of the 2008 Olympic Games and seems to hold a permanent spot on the list of China’s most liveable cities (despite the larger-than-life green tide of algal blooms that infest Qingdao’s waters in summer).
在和平时期，青岛成为中国的主要港口之一，也是繁荣的贸易和制造业中心（国内外品牌的所在地）。这个港口城市举办了 2008 年奥运会的帆船比赛项目，并且似乎在中国最宜居城市名单上占有一席之地（尽管夏季青岛水域的藻华绿潮异常严重）。

青岛

7Shopping

38Jimolu MarketB1
38Jimolu 市场 B1

1Sights
1 景点

Shinan District (市南区, Shìnán Qū) is where you’ll spend most of your time. Shinan’s sights are squeezed into two main areas: Old Town (the former concession area), with the train and bus stations, historic architecture and budget accommodation, and Badaguan (八大关, Bādàguān), a serene residential area of parks, spas and old villas. At the time of research, much of Old Town (around the Zhufu Lu area) was being prepared for a massive facelift. Depending on how soon you visit it will either resemble a building site, or look beautiful.
市南区 （市南区 ， Shìnán Qū） 是您大部分时间度过的地方。市南的景点分为两个主要区域：老城区（前特许区），拥有火车站和汽车站、历史建筑和经济型住宿，以及八大关（八大关 ，Bādàguān），一个宁静的住宅区，拥有公园、水疗中心和老别墅。在研究时，老城区的大部分地区（主府路地区周围）正在准备进行大规模整修。根据您访问的时间，它要么类似于建筑工地，要么看起来很漂亮。

East of Shandong Lu rises the modern city, with the central business district (CBD) to the north and retail and dining in an area called Dongbu (东部, Dōngbù), closer to the water to the south. Further east is the developing Lao Shan district (崂山区, Láoshān Qū), anchored by the Municipal Museum, Grand Theatre and International Beer City (site of Qingdao’s famous annual International Beer Festival).
山东路以东是现代化城市，北面是中央商务区（CBD），南边靠近水边的东部（ 东部 ，东部）是零售和餐饮场所。再往东是发展中的崂山区（崂山区 ，Láoshān Qū），以市博物馆、大剧院和国际啤酒城（青岛著名的年度国际啤酒节举办地）为中心。

Huilan PavilionNOTABLE BUILDING
汇兰阁著名建筑

(map Google map; 回阑阁, Huílán Gé; 12 Taiping Lu, 太平路12号; h8.30am-4pm; mQingdao Railway Station) F
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 回阑阁 ，Huílán Gé;太平路太平路 12 号 h 8.30am-4pm; m 青岛火车站） F

Lit up at night, this graceful pavilion decorates the end of Zhan Bridge poking into Qingdao Bay. If it looks familiar, that’s because it’s on every Tsingtao beer label.
夜晚灯火通明，这座优雅的亭子装饰着刺入青岛湾的湛桥的尽头。如果它看起来很熟悉，那是因为它出现在每个青岛啤酒标签上。

Little QingdaoLIGHTHOUSE, ISLAND
小青岛灯塔，岛屿

(map Google map; 小青岛, Xiǎo Qīngdǎo; 26 Qinyu Lu, 琴屿路26号; ¥10; h6am-8pm; g6, 26, 202, 231, 304, mHall of the People)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 小青岛 ，Xiǎo Qīngdǎo; 26 Qinyu Lu， 琴屿路 26 号 ; ¥10; h 早上 6 点至晚上 8 点; g 6、26、202、231、304， m 人民堂）

In the shape of a qín (a stringed instrument) jutting into Qingdao Bay, this former island – which lends its name to the city – was connected to the mainland in the 1940s. The Germans built the white lighthouse in 1900 on the leafy promontory. It is an excellent spot for watching the city come to life in the morning; entry is free from 6am to 7.30am and from 6.30pm to 8pm.
这座前岛屿呈琴（一种弦乐器）的形状伸入青岛湾，这座城市因此而得名，在 1940 年代与大陆相连。德国人于 1900 年在绿树成荫的海角上建造了这座白色灯塔。这里是观看城市在早晨变得生机勃勃的绝佳地点;早上 6 点至早上 7.30 以及下午 6.30 至晚上 8 点免费入场。

Chinese Navy MuseumMUSEUM
中国海军博物馆 MUSEUM

(map Google map; 中国海军博物馆, Zhōngguó Hǎijūn Bówùguǎn; %0532 8286 6784; www.hjbwg.com; 8 Caiyang Lu, 菜阳路8号; entrance ¥30, incl submarine entrance ¥100; h9am-5pm; g26, 202, 501, mHall of the People)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 中国海军博物馆 ，Zhōngguó Hǎijūn Bówùguǎn; % 0532 8286 6784;www.hjbwg.com;8 彩阳路， 菜阳路 8 号 ;门票 30 日元，含潜艇门票 100 日元; h 上午 9 点至下午 5 点; g 26、202、501， m 人民堂）

Beside the entrance to Little Qingdao lighthouse, this museum’s main attractions are the rusty submarine and destroyer anchored in the harbour, for which you need to buy the ¥100 ticket. The ¥30 ticket will get you into the complex, allowing to see all the other boats and naval equipment on show, as well as displays on Chinese naval history.
在小青岛灯塔的入口旁边，这个博物馆的主要景点是停泊在港口的生锈的潜艇和驱逐舰，你需要购买100日元的门票。30日元的门票将带您进入综合体，可以看到所有其他船只和海军装备，以及中国海军历史的展览。

Protestant ChurchCHURCH
新教教会 CHURCH

(map Google map; 基督教堂, Jīdū Jiàotáng; 15 Jiangsu Lu, 江苏路15号; ¥10; h8.30am-5.30pm; g1, 221, 367, mHall of the People)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 基督教堂 ， Jīdū Jiàotáng; 15 Jiangsu Lu， 江苏路 15 号 ; ¥10; h 上午 8.30 至下午 5.30; g 1、221、367， m 人民堂）

On a street of German buildings, this copper-capped beauty was designed by Curt Rothkegel and built in 1908. The interior is simple and Lutheran in its sparseness, apart from some carvings on the pillar cornices. You can climb up to inspect the clock mechanism (from Bockenem, dated 1909).
在一条德国建筑林立的街道上，这座铜顶美景由柯特·罗斯凯格尔 （Curt Rothkegel） 设计，建于 1908 年。内部简单，除了柱子飞檐上的一些雕刻外，路德教风格很稀疏。您可以爬上去检查时钟装置（来自 Bockenem，1909 年）。

Governor’s House MuseumMUSEUM
总督府博物馆 MUSEUM

(map Google map; 青岛德国总督楼旧址博物馆, Qīngdǎo Déguó Zǒngdū Lóu Jiùzhǐ Bówùguǎn; %0532 8286 8838; 26 Longshan Lu, 龙山路26号; summer/winter ¥20/13, multilingual audio tour ¥20; h8.30am-5.30pm; g1, 221, mHall of the People)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 青岛德国总督楼旧址博物馆 ，Qīngdǎo Déguó Zǒngdū Lóu Jiùzhǐ Bówùguǎn; % 0532 8286 8838; 龙山路龙山路 26 号 ;夏季/冬季 20/13 日元，多语种语音导览 20 日元; h 上午 8.30 至下午 5.30; g 1， 221， m 人民厅）

This museum is one of Qingdao’s best examples of concession-era architecture – the former German governor’s residence constructed in the style of a German palace. The building’s interior is characteristic of Jugendstil, the German arm of art nouveau, with some German and Chinese furnishings of the era. It was built in 1903 at a cost of 2,450,000 taels of silver by an indulgent governor, whom Kaiser Wilhelm II immediately sacked when he saw the bill.
这座博物馆是青岛租界时代建筑的最佳典范之一——前德国总督官邸，以德国宫殿的风格建造。该建筑的内部具有德国新艺术运动分支 Jugendsttil 的特色，并配有一些那个时代的德国和中国家具。它建于 1903 年，由一位放纵的总督耗资 2,450,000 两白银建造，德皇威廉二世看到该钞票后立即解雇了他。

In 1957 Chairman Mao stayed here with his wife and kids on holiday. So did defence minister Lin Biao, who would later attempt to assassinate Mao.
1957年，毛主席带着妻子和孩子在这里度假。国防部长林彪也是如此，他后来试图刺杀毛。

Qingdao City Art MuseumMUSEUM
青岛市美术馆 MUSEUM

(map Google map; 青岛市美术馆, Qīngdǎo Shì Měishùguǎn; %0532 8288 8886; http://qdmsg.sdgw.com; 7 Daxue Lu, 大学路7号; h9am-4.30pm; g1, 25, 221, 367, mHall of the People) F
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 青岛市美术馆 ，Qīngdǎo Shì Měishùguǎn; % 0532 8288 8886;http://qdmsg.sdgw.com;7 Daxue Lu， 大学路 7 号 h 9am-4.30pm; g 1、25、221、367， m 人民大厅） F

Contemporary works are on display in this compact museum housed in its own architectural masterpiece, a 1930s structure reflecting an eclectic mix of architectural styles from deco to Byzantine, Islamic and imperial Chinese.
这座紧凑的博物馆陈列着当代作品，该博物馆拥有自己的建筑杰作，这是一座 1930 年代的建筑，反映了从装饰到拜占庭、伊斯兰和中国帝国的不拘一格的建筑风格。

St Michael’s CathedralCHURCH
圣迈克尔大教堂教堂

(map Google map; 天主教堂, Tiānzhǔ Jiàotáng; %0532 8286 5960; 15 Zhejiang Lu, 浙江路15号; ¥10; h8.30am-5pm Mon-Sat, from 10am Sun; g1, 221, 367, mQingdao Railway Station)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 天主教堂 ， Tiānzhǔ Jiàotáng; % 0532 8286 5960; 15 Zhejiang Lu， 浙江路 15 号 ; ¥10; h 周一至周六上午 8.30 至下午 5 点，周日上午 10 点开始; g 1、221、367， m 青岛火车站）

Up a hill off Zhongshan Lu looms this grand Gothic- and Roman-style edifice. Completed in 1934, the church spires were supposed to be clock towers, but Chancellor Hitler cut funding of overseas projects and the plans were scrapped. The church was badly damaged during the Cultural Revolution and the crosses capping its twin spires were torn off. Devout locals buried the crosses for safe keeping. In 2005 workers uncovered them while repairing pipes in the hills, and they have since been restored.
在中山路的一座小山上，这座宏伟的哥特式和罗马式建筑若隐若现。教堂尖顶于 1934 年竣工，本应是钟楼，但希特勒总理削减了对海外项目的资助，该计划被取消。教堂在文化大革命期间遭到严重破坏，双尖顶上的十字架被撕掉。虔诚的当地人将十字架埋起来以妥善保管。2005 年，工人们在山上修理管道时发现了它们，此后它们已被修复。

Tianhou TempleTEMPLE
天后宫 TEMPLE

(map Google map; 天后宫, Tiānhòu Gōng; 19 Taiping Lu, 太平路19号; h8am-6pm; g25, mHall of the People) F
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 天后宫 ，Tiānhòu Gōng;太平路 19 h 号 8am-6pm; g 25、 m 人民堂） F

This small restored temple dedicated to Tiānhòu (天后), the patron of seafarers, has stood by the shore since 1467. The main hall contains a colourful statue of the goddess, flanked by fearsome guardians. There is also Dragon King Hall (龙王殿, Lóngwáng Diàn), where a splayed pig lies before the ruler of oceans and king of the rains, and a shrine to the God of Wealth. A temple fair is held here annually during the Spring Festival.
这座经过修复的小寺庙供奉着海员的守护神天后 ，自 1467 年以来一直矗立在岸边。主殿内有一尊色彩缤纷的女神雕像，两侧是可怕的守护者。还有龙王殿 （ 龙王殿 ，Lóngwáng Diàn），那里躺着一头张开的猪，躺在海洋统治者和雨王面前，还有一座供奉财神的神殿。每年春节期间，这里都会举办庙会。

oTsingtao Beer MuseumBREWERY
o 青岛啤酒博物馆 BREWERY

(map Google map; 青岛啤酒博物馆, Qīngdǎo Píjiǔ Bówùguǎn; %0532 8383 3437; www.tsingtaomuseum.com; 56-1 Dengzhou Lu, 登州路56-1号; admission ¥60-90, English guide per group ¥150; h8.30am-6pm; g2, 205)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 青岛啤酒博物馆 ，Qīngdǎo Píjiǔ Bówùguǎn; % 0532 8383 3437;www.tsingtaomuseum.com;登州路 56-1 号， 登州路 56-1 号 ;门票¥60-90，英文导游每团¥150; h 上午 8.30 至下午 6 点; g 2， 205）

For a self-serving introduction to China’s iconic beer, head to the original and still-operating brewery. On view are old photos, preserved brewery equipment and statistics, and there are also a few fascinating glimpses of the modern factory line. The aroma of hops is everywhere. And you get to sample brews along the way (how much depends on which ticket you buy).
要自助介绍中国标志性啤酒，请前往原始且仍在运营的啤酒厂。展出的是老照片、保存完好的啤酒厂设备和统计数据，还有一些现代工厂生产线的迷人一瞥。啤酒花的香气无处不在。您可以沿途品尝啤酒（多少取决于您购买的门票）。

If you want to keep drinking, Tsingtao IPA and yuan jiang are both on tap in 1903 Cafe (8am to 6pm), the brewery’s own little pub, located by the ticket office.
如果您想继续喝酒，青岛 IPA 和元江都可以在 1903 Cafe（上午 8 点至下午 6 点）提供，这是啤酒厂自己的小酒吧，位于售票处旁边。

To get here, take bus 2 or 205 from Zhongshan Lu and get off at Tai Dong bus stop. Tai Dong will have its own metro station soon too.
前往这里，从中山路乘坐2路或205路公交车，在大东公交站下车。大东也将很快拥有自己的地铁站。

Qingdao Municipal MuseumMUSEUM
青岛市博物馆 MUSEUM

(青岛市博物馆, Qīngdǎo Shì Bówùguǎn; %0532 8889 6286; www.qingdaomuseum.com; 51 Meiling Donglu, 梅岭东路51号; h9am-4.30pm Tue-Sun; g230, 321, mMiaoling Rd) F
（ 青岛市博物馆 ，Qīngdǎo Shì Bówùguǎn; % 0532 8889 6286;www.qingdaomuseum.com;梅岭东路梅岭东路 51 号 h 周二至周日上午 9 时至下午 4 时 30 分; g 庙岭路 F 230、321） m

This massive collection of relics anchors the budding cultural zone in Lao Shan district. It has the usual broad span of exhibits expected in a big-city museum, ranging from the prehistoric to the industrial age. Collections of folk-art woodcuts and intriguing coins pressed with Kyrgyz script stand out. From Miaoling Rd metro station, walk south down Shenzhen Lu and take the first left.
这些庞大的文物收藏是老山区萌芽文化区的基础。它拥有大城市博物馆通常所期望的广泛展品，从史前时代到工业时代。一系列民间艺术木刻和印有吉尔吉斯斯坦文字的有趣硬币脱颖而出。从妙岭路地铁站出发，沿深圳路向南步行，在第一个路口左转。

Huashi LouNOTABLE BUILDING
华石楼著名建筑

(花石楼, Huāshí Lóu; %0532 8387 2168; 18 Huanghai Lu, 黄海路18号; ¥8.50; h8.30am-5.30pm; g26, 231, 604, mTaipingjiao Park)
（ 花石楼 ，Huāshí Lóu; % 0532 8387 2168; 黄海路 18 号黄海路 18 号 ; ¥8.50; h 上午 8.30 至下午 5.30; g 太平角公园 26 m 、231、604）

This granite and marble villa built in 1930 was first the home of a Russian aristocrat, and later the German governor’s hunting lodge. It is also known as the ‘Chiang Kaishek Building’, as the generalissimo secretly stayed here in 1947. While most of the rooms are closed, you can clamber up two narrow stairwells to the turret for a great view.
这座建于 1930 年的花岗岩和大理石别墅最初是俄罗斯贵族的住所，后来是德国总督的狩猎小屋。它也被称为“蒋介石大厦”，因为大元帅于 1947 年秘密住在这里。虽然大部分房间都是关闭的，但您可以爬上两个狭窄的楼梯间到达塔楼，欣赏美景。

It’s at the east end of No 2 Bathing Beach at the southern tip of Zijingguan Lu in Badaguan district.
它位于八大关区紫荆关路南端的2号海水浴场东端。

rBeaches
r 海滩

Qingdao has very pleasant beaches, though they are sometimes afflicted in summer with outrageous blue-green algae blooms and litter. Chinese beach culture is low-key, with men sporting the skimpy swimwear and women covering up from the sun. Swimming season (June to September) means hordes of sun-seekers fighting for towel space on weekends. Shark nets, lifeguards, lifeboat patrols and medical stations are on hand.
青岛拥有非常宜人的海滩，尽管在夏季有时会出现令人发指的蓝绿藻大量繁殖和垃圾。中国的海滩文化是低调的，男人穿着暴露的泳装，女人则遮挡阳光。游泳季节（6 月至 9 月）意味着成群结队的阳光爱好者在周末争夺毛巾空间。防鲨网、救生员、救生艇巡逻队和医疗站随时待命。

There are a number of ways to enjoy the water without jumping in. If you give in to touts, 30-minute rides around the bay go for around ¥60. Or stroll the Binhai boardwalk (滨海步行道, Bīnhǎi bùxíngdào), which stretches almost unbroken for an incredible 40km along the city’s shoreline.
有多种方法可以在不跳入水中的情况下享受水。如果你屈服于兜售者，环海湾 30 分钟的车程大约需要 60 日元。或者漫步滨海木板路（滨海步行道 ，Bīnhǎi bùxíngdào），沿着城市的海岸线绵延 40 公里，几乎不间断。

No 6 Bathing BeachBEACH
6 号海水浴滩海滩

(map Google map; 第六海水浴场, Dì Liù Hǎishuǐ Yùchǎng; g25, 202, mQingdao Railway Station)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 第六海水浴场 ， Dì Liù Hǎishuǐ Yùchǎng; g 25、202、 m 青岛火车站）

This is the closest beach to the Old Town, and a great spot come early evening, when the buildings around the bay are illuminated. No 6 Bathing Beach is a short strip of sand and tide pools, next to Zhan Bridge, the pier that reaches into the bay. At the tip of the pier, the eight-sided Huilan Pavilion is a graceful sight, though it’s often packed to the rafters.
这是距离老城区最近的海滩，傍晚时分，海湾周围的建筑物被照亮，这是一个好地方。6 号海水浴场是一条短长的沙池和潮汐池，毗邻通往海湾的码头湛桥。在码头的顶端， 八面的汇兰亭是一个优雅的景象，尽管它经常挤到椽子上。

Shilaoren BeachBEACH
石老仁海滩海滩 （Shilaoren Beach） 海滩

(石老人海水浴场, Shílǎorén Hǎishuǐ Yùchǎng; g301, mShilaoren Beach)
（ 石老人海水浴场 ，Shílǎorén Hǎishuǐ Yùchǎng; g 301， m Shilaoren 海滩）

On the far eastern side of town in Lao Shan district, and now with its own metro station, this 2.5km-long strip of clean sand is Qingdao’s largest and has the highest waves in town (decent for bodyboarding); it can be very quiet in the morning too. The ‘Old Stone Man’ from which the beach gets its name is the rocky outcrop to the east.
这条 2.5 公里长的干净沙滩位于城镇最东侧的老山区，现在拥有自己的地铁站，是青岛最大的沙滩，也是镇上最高的海浪（适合趴板冲浪）;早上也可以很安静。海滩得名的“老石头人”是东边的岩石露头。

Golden Sand BeachBEACH
金沙滩海滩

(金沙滩, Jīnshā Tān; g2, 隧道7)

For wide-open spaces of sand, sea and sky, there’s Golden Sand Beach on the western peninsula of Huangdao district (团岛区, Huángdǎo Qū). An undersea tunnel linking Huangdao and the district of Shinan (市南, Shìnán) puts it within easy reach of Old Town. Take tunnel bus 7 (隧道7; ¥2, 30 minutes) from Jiaozhou Lu or the train station and get off at the second stop after the tunnel; from here, walk back, then turn right. A taxi costs around ¥70 including toll.
对于沙滩、海洋和天空的开阔空间，位于黄岛区西部半岛的金沙滩。一条连接黄岛和市南区的海底隧道使其可轻松到达老城区。从胶州路或火车站乘坐隧道 7 路（ 隧道 7;2 元，30 分钟），在隧道后第二站下车;从这里走回来，然后右转。出租车费用约为 70 日元（含通行费）。

No 3 Bathing BeachBEACH
3 号海水浴滩海滩

(map Google map; 第三海水浴场, Dì Sān Hǎishuǐ Yùchǎng; g26, 202, mTaipingjiao Park)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 第三海水浴场 ， Dì Sān Hǎishuǐ Yùchǎng; g 太平角公园 26、202） m

On the eastern side of Taiping Cape in Badaguan is this cove with dedicated swim lanes, paddle boats and gentle waves. Very close to Taipingjiao Park metro station.
在八大关太平角的东侧，是这个海湾，有专门的泳道、明轮船和温柔的海浪。离太平角公园地铁站很近。

No 1 Bathing BeachBEACH
1 号海水浴场海滩

(map Google map; 第一海水浴场, Dì Yī Hǎishuǐ Yùchǎng; g304, mHuiquan Sq)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 第一海水浴场 ， Dì Yī Hǎishuǐ Yùchǎng; g 汇泉广场 304 号 m ）

South of the tree-lined area known as Badaguan (八大关, Bādàguān), No 1 Bathing Beach is a very popular spot, perhaps for its snack stalls and children’s toy selection, but more likely for its muscle beach.
在被称为八大关（八大关 ，Bādàguān）的绿树成荫的地区以南，1 号海水浴场是一个非常受欢迎的地方，也许是因为它的小吃摊和儿童玩具选择，但更多的是因为它的肌肉海滩。

No 2 Bathing BeachBEACH
2 号海水浴场海滩

(第二海水浴场, Dì Èr Hǎishuǐ Yùchǎng; g214, mTaipingjiao Park)
（ 第二海水浴场 ，Dì Èr Hǎishuǐ Yùchǎng; g 太平角公园 214 号 m ）

Once reserved only for the likes of Mao and other state leaders, this sheltered cove just east of Badaguan has calm waters good for a swim. It’s a short walk from Taipingjiao Park metro station.
这个位于八达关以东的避风海湾曾经只为毛和其他国家领导人保留，其水域平静，适合游泳。距离太平角公园地铁站仅几步之遥。

QINGDAO’S PARKS
青岛的公园

Many parks that carry entrance tickets, including Little Fish Hill by No 1 Bathing Beach and Signal Hill Park in Old Town, are free to enter for around an hour before and after the official opening times.
许多有门票的公园，包括 1 号海水浴场旁的小鱼山和老城区的信号山公园 ，在正式开放时间前后大约一个小时内免费进入。

Zhongshan Park map Google map (中山公园, Zhōngshān Gōngyuán; h24hr; g25, 26, mZhongshan Pk) Within central Qingdao, Zhongshan Park is a vast 69 hectares of lakes, gardens and walking paths; it’s an amusement park for kids and also the venue of lively festivals in the spring and summer. In the park’s northeast rises Taiping Hill map Google map (太平山, Tàipíng Shān) with a cable car (one way/return ¥70/120; h8.30am-5.30pm) to the TV Tower (电视塔, Diànshì Tǎ; %0532 8361 2286; admission ¥100) at the top. Also within the park is Qingdao’s largest temple, Zhanshan Temple map Google map (湛山寺, Zhànshān Sì; ¥10; h8am-4pm), an active Buddhist sanctuary.
中山公园地图 Google map（ 中山公园 ， Zhōngshān Gōngyuán; h 24 小时; g 25， 26， m Zhongshan Pk） 中山公园位于青岛市中心，占地 69 公顷，拥有广阔的湖泊、花园和步行道;这里是儿童游乐园，也是春夏热闹节日的举办地。公园东北方耸立着太平山地图 ， 有缆车 （单程/来回¥70/120; h 8.30am-5.30pm） 到电视塔 （ 电视塔 ，Diànshì Tǎ; % 0532 8361 2286;门票 100 日元） 在顶部。公园内还有青岛最大的寺庙湛山寺地图 Google map（ 湛山寺 ，Zhànshān Sì;¥10; h 上午 8 点至下午 4 点）， 一个活跃的佛教圣地。

When you get off the cable car at the temple, look for a round concrete dome on the right. This is the entrance to a bunker, which the Germans used as a wine cellar, and today houses a wine bar.
当您在寺庙下缆车时，请在右侧寻找一个圆形混凝土圆顶。这是一个地堡的入口，德国人将其用作酒窖，今天设有一家酒吧。

Little Fish Hill map Google map (小鱼山公园, Xiǎoyúshān Gōngyuán; %0532 8286 5645; 24 Fushanzhi Lu, 福山支路24号; ¥10; h6am-8pm; mHuaquan Sq) This sweet little park is near No 1 Bathing Beach. Admission is free after 6.30pm.
小鱼山地图 Google map（ 小鱼山公园 ， Xiǎoyúshān Gōngyuán; % 0532 8286 5645; 福山支路 24 号 ; ¥10; h 早上 6 点至晚上 8 点; m 华泉广场） 这个甜蜜的小公园靠近 1 号海水浴场。下午 6.30 后免费入场。

Signal Hill Park map Google map (信号山, Xìnhào Shān; 16 Longshan Lu, 龙山路16号; park entrance/viewing platform ¥5/10; h6am-8.30pm; mHall of the People) This park above Qingdao’s Old Town is free to enter from 6am to 7.30am and from 6pm to 8.30pm.
信号山公园地图 Google map（ 信号山 ，Xìnhào Shān;龙山路 16 号， 龙山路 16 号 ;公园入口/观景台 ¥5/10; h 早上 6 点至晚上 8.30; m 人民会堂） 这个位于青岛老城区上方的公园，早上 6 点至 7 点 30 分以及下午 6 点至晚上 8 点 30 分免费入场。

zFestivals & Events
z 节日和活动

oInternational Beer FestivalBEER
o 国际啤酒节 BEER

(9am-3pm ¥10, 3-10.30pm ¥20; hAug)
（上午 9 点至下午 3 点 10 日元，晚上 3 点至 10 点 30 分 20 日元; h 8 月）

The city’s premier party draws more than three million tipplers every August. It’s not just Tsingtao on the menu, so expect a galaxy of international and domestic brands.
该市的首屈一指的派对每年 8 月都会吸引超过 300 万观众。菜单上不仅仅是青岛，所以期待国际和国内品牌的星系。

(www.qdsailing.org; hAug/Sep)

Watch (or join) the regattas and windsurfing by the Olympic Sailing Center every August/September.
每年 8 月/9 月，在奥林匹克帆船中心观看（或参加）帆船赛和风帆冲浪。

Cherry Blossom FestivalCULTURAL
樱花节文化

(Zhongshan Park, 中山公园; hApr)
（中山公园， 中山公园 h 4 月）

The cherry blossoms explode with colour in Zhongshan Park around April, bringing splashes of colour to Qingdao’s oldest and largest park.
四月左右，中山公园的樱花绽放色彩，为青岛最古老、最大的公园带来了绚丽的色彩。

4Sleeping
4 睡眠

Old Town in particular is packed with cheap youth hostels but, like many of the city’s budget hotels, most of them do not accept foreigners. (The ones we’ve reviewed all do.) The CBD and Dongbu have the top-end international chains but a lot less soul. Rates increase by as much as 30% in July and August, when sun-seekers fill the beaches.
尤其是老城区，到处都是廉价的青年旅舍，但与该市的许多经济型酒店一样，大多数都不接受外国人入住。（我们审查过的那些都这样做了。CBD 和 Dongbu 拥有高端国际连锁店，但灵魂要少得多。7 月和 8 月，当寻求阳光的人挤满海滩时，价格上涨了 30%。

Mǐjiā Qīngnián LǚshěHOSTEL¥

(map Google map; 米家青年旅舍; %155 5323 0890; 40 Hunan Lu, 湖南路40号; dm ¥38-80, r ¥120-240; aW; mQingdao Railway Station)
（ 地图谷歌地图 ; 米家青年旅舍 % 155 5323 0890; 40 Hunan Lu， 湖南路 40 号 ; dm ¥38-80， r ¥120-240; a W m 青岛火车站）

This whole hostel is in the basement of a large building so there are no windows whatsoever, but it’s clean, modern and brightly lit, and staff are welcoming despite speaking no English. The dorms are self-contained ‘capsules’ and are tiny, as are the cheapest private rooms. The ¥210 and ¥240 rooms are larger, have bathrooms and can sleep four people.
整个旅馆位于一栋大楼的地下室，所以没有任何窗户，但它干净、现代、明亮，尽管不会说英语，但工作人员很热情。宿舍是独立的“胶囊”，而且很小，最便宜的私人房间也是如此。210日元和240日元的房间更大，有浴室，可以睡四个人。

oKaiyue HostelHOSTEL¥

This spacious, sociable, friendly and helpful hostel in a historic church at the junction of Sifang Lu and Jining Lu has a lively congregation. They come to worship in the slick ground-floor bar and restaurant, Jinns’ Café (8am to 1am), which serves western food (mains ¥30 to ¥90) including great pizza and desserts. Rooms are pricy for a hostel, but very smart.
这家宽敞、善于交际、友好且乐于助人的旅馆位于四方路和济宁路交界处的一座历史悠久的教堂内，会众热闹非凡。他们来到一楼时尚的酒吧和餐厅 Jinns' Café（ 上午 8 点至凌晨 1 点 ）做礼拜，那里供应西餐（主菜 30 至 90 日元），包括美味的比萨饼和甜点。对于旅馆来说，房间很贵，但非常聪明。

MG HotelHOTEL¥¥

This sharp and sassy new hotel, close to the beach, has helpful, English-speaking staff and modern rooms that are comfortable despite being small. The cheapest doubles are Japanese-style tatami rooms with mattresses on the floor and low-level furniture to match. Other rooms have standard beds and more space.
这家尖锐而时髦的新酒店靠近海滩，拥有乐于助人的会说英语的工作人员和现代化的客房，尽管很小，但很舒适。最便宜的双人间是日式榻榻米房间，地板上铺着床垫，搭配低矮的家具。其他客房配有标准床和更多空间。

Wheat Youth HostelHOSTEL¥¥

This lovely Old Town hostel is in a beautiful, restored pīcháiyuàn, the courtyard apartments of 1920s Qingdao, and within a 10-minute walk of the train station. Rooms are spotless with nostalgic details and creaky hardwood floors, and the communal courtyard spaces make pleasant hang-outs.
这家可爱的老城区旅舍位于经过修复的美丽皮查云（pīcháiyuàn） 内，是 1920 年代青岛的庭院公寓，距离火车站有不到 10 分钟的步行路程。客房一尘不染，拥有怀旧的细节和吱吱作响的硬木地板，公共庭院空间是愉快的闲逛场所。

这家现代化、地理位置优越的 15 间客房酒店坐落在一片安静的海滨别墅飞地，是海滨游客的绝佳选择。您必须至少花 1000 日元才能欣赏海景，但即使没有海景，3 号海滩也仅几步之遥，外面很受欢迎的海滨长廊让您在晚上散步愉快。

It’s a short walk from Yan’an 3rd Rd metro station; come out out of Exit C, walk back on yourself, turn left at the crossroads, then right at the end (onto Donghai Xilu), first left into Aomen Rd, then right into the enclave (天林花园).
距离延安三路地铁站仅几步之遥;从 C 出口出来，自己走回去，在十字路口左转，然后在尽头右转（进入东海西路），先左转进入奥门路，然后右转进入飞地（ 天林花园 ）。

This dignified five-storey hotel benefits from a superb seafront location overlooking Zhan Bridge and Qingdao Bay. Little touches like complimentary snacks put it leagues ahead of its neighbours.

LOCAL SEAFOOD
当地海鲜

For the staple local seafood, stick to the streets. The Taidong neighbourhood between Taidong Yilu (台东一路) and Taidong Balu (台东八路) in Shibei district (市北区) north of Old Town is packed with restaurants, street markets and carts. Take bus 2, 222 or 217. For the quintessential Qingdao meal, buy a jīn of clams – in local-speak gálá (蛤蜊; from ¥18) – and take it to a street-side stall with ‘加功’ (jiā gōng) on its sign. They’ll cook up your catch for ¥5, and pour you a plastic bag of fresh Tsingtao beer for ¥8 more (decanting it into a glass is tricky, but pints and pitchers are also available if you want to be fancy).
对于当地的主食海鲜，请坚持走在街上。位于老城区以北市北区的台东一路和台东八路之间的台东街区，遍布餐馆、街头市场和手推车。乘坐 2、222 或 217 路公交车。要吃一顿典型的青岛美食，可以买一斤蛤蜊——蛤蜊 （蛤蜊 ，18 日元起）——然后带到街边的摊上，牌子上写着“ 加功 ”（jiā gōng）。他们会花 5 日元煮你捕获的啤酒，然后多花 8 日元给你倒一个塑料袋新鲜青岛啤酒（把它倒进玻璃杯里很棘手，但如果你想花哨的话，也可以买品脱啤酒和水罐）。

Up on the boardwalk, and with shaded terrace seating, this is the only cafe overlooking No 1 Bathing Beach that does proper coffee.

MADE IN TSINGTAO
青岛制造

The beer of choice in Chinese restaurants around the world, Tsingtao is one of China’s oldest and most respected brands. Established in 1903 by a joint German–British corporation, the Germania-Brauerei began as a microbrewery of sorts using spring water from nearby Lao Shan to brew a Pilsener Light and Munich Dark for homesick German troops. In 1914 the Japanese occupied Qingdao and confiscated the plant, rechristening it Dai Nippon and increasing production to sell under the Tsingtao, Asahi and Kirin labels. In 1945 the Chinese took over and gave the brewery its current name. At first, only China’s elite could afford to drink it, but advertisements touting Tsingtao as a health drink boosted its appeal, and in 2014 the world drank more than 181 million kegs of the golden brew.
青岛是世界各地中餐馆的首选啤酒，是中国历史最悠久、最受尊敬的品牌之一。Germania-Brauerei 由一家德英合资公司于 1903 年创立，最初是一家小型啤酒厂，利用附近老掸的泉水为思乡的德国军队酿造比尔森淡啤酒和慕尼黑黑暗啤酒。1914 年，日本占领青岛并没收了该工厂，将其重新命名为大日本，并增加了产量，以青岛、朝日和麒麟的标签销售。1945 年，中国人接管了啤酒厂，并命名为现在的名称。起初，只有中国的精英阶层才能喝得起，但宣传青岛作为健康饮料的广告提高了它的吸引力，2014 年，全世界喝了超过 1.81 亿桶金啤酒。
